original: 06,024.004a kathaṃ bhīṣmam ahaṃ saṃkhye droṇaṃ ca madhusūdana
analyzed: katham bhīṣmam aham saṃkhye droṇam ca madhusūdana
iṣubhiḥ pratiyotsyāmi pūjā arhau ari sūdana
gurūn a hatvā hi mahā anubhāvān
śreyaḥ bhoktum bhaikṣam api iha loke
hatvā artha kāmān tu gurūn iha eva
bhuñjīya bhogān rudhira pradigdhān

original: 06,024.006a na caitad vidmaḥ kataran no garīyo;
analyzed: na ca etat vidmaḥ katarat naḥ garīyaḥ

original: yad vā jayema yadi vā no jayeyuḥ
analyzed: yat vā jayema yadi vā naḥ jayeyuḥ
yān eva hatvā na jijīviṣāmas
te vasthitāḥ pramukhe dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ
kārpaṇya doṣa upahata svabhāvaḥ
pṛcchāmi tvām dharma saṃmūḍha cetāḥ

original: 06,024.007c yac chreyaḥ syān niścitaṃ brūhi tan me;
analyzed: yat śreyaḥ syāt niścitam brūhi tat me

original: śiṣyas te 'haṃ śādhi māṃ tvāṃ prapannam
analyzed: śiṣyaḥ te ham śādhi mām tvām prapannam
na hi prapaśyāmi mama apanudyāt
yat śokam ucchoṣaṇam indriyāṇām
avāpya bhūmau asapatnam ṛddham
rājyam surāṇām api ca ādhipatyam
saṃjayaḥ uvāca
evam uktvā hṛṣīkeśam guḍākeśaḥ paraṃtapa

original: 06,024.009c na yotsya iti govindam uktvā tūṣṇīṃ babhūva ha
analyzed: na yotsye iti govindam uktvā tūṣṇīm babhūva ha

original: 06,024.010a tam uvāca hṛṣīkeśaḥ prahasann iva bhārata
analyzed: tam uvāca hṛṣīkeśaḥ prahasan iva bhārata

original: 06,024.010c senayor ubhayor madhye viṣīdantam idaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: senayoḥ ubhayoḥ madhye viṣīdantam idam vacaḥ
śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: 06,024.011a aśocyān anvaśocas tvaṃ prajñāvādāṃś ca bhāṣase
analyzed: a śocyān anvaśocaḥ tvam prajñā vādān ca bhāṣase
gatāsūn agatāsūn ca na anuśocanti paṇḍitāḥ
tvam mānuṣyeṇa upahata antarātmā
viṣāda moha abhibhavāt visaṃjñaḥ
kṛpā gṛhītaḥ samavekṣya bandhūn
abhiprapannān mukham antakasya

original: 06,024.012a na tv evāhaṃ jātu nāsaṃ na tvaṃ neme janādhipāḥ
analyzed: na tu eva aham jātu na āsam na tvam na ime janādhipāḥ

original: 06,024.012c na caiva na bhaviṣyāmaḥ sarve vayam ataḥ param
analyzed: na ca eva na bhaviṣyāmaḥ sarve vayam atas param

original: 06,024.013a dehino 'smin yathā dehe kaumāraṃ yauvanaṃ jarā
analyzed: dehinaḥ u smin yathā dehe kaumāram yauvanam jarā

original: 06,024.013c tathā dehāntaraprāptir dhīras tatra na muhyati
analyzed: tathā deha antara prāptiḥ dhīraḥ tatra na muhyati
mātrā sparśāḥ tu kaunteya śīta uṣṇa sukha duḥkha dāḥ
āgama apāyinaḥ nityāḥ tān titikṣasva bhārata

original: 06,024.015a yaṃ hi na vyathayanty ete puruṣaṃ puruṣarṣabha
analyzed: yam hi na vyathayanti ete puruṣam puruṣa ṛṣabha
sama duḥkha sukham dhīram saḥ mṛta tvāya kalpate

original: 06,024.016a nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ
analyzed: na asataḥ vidyate bhāvaḥ na abhāvaḥ vidyate sataḥ

original: 06,024.016c ubhayor api dṛṣṭo 'ntas tv anayos tattvadarśibhiḥ
analyzed: ubhayoḥ api dṛṣṭaḥ ntaḥ tu anayoḥ tattva darśibhiḥ

original: 06,024.017a avināśi tu tad viddhi yena sarvam idaṃ tatam
analyzed: avināśi tu tat viddhi yena sarvam idam tatam

original: 06,024.017c vināśam avyayasyāsya na kaś cit kartum arhati
analyzed: vināśam avyayasya asya na kaḥ cit kartum arhati
antavantaḥ ime dehāḥ nityasya uktāḥ śarīriṇaḥ
anāśino prameyasya tasmāt yudhyasva bhārata

original: 06,024.019a ya enaṃ vetti hantāraṃ yaś cainaṃ manyate hatam
analyzed: yaḥ enam vetti hantāram yaḥ ca enam manyate hatam

original: 06,024.019c ubhau tau na vijānīto nāyaṃ hanti na hanyate
analyzed: ubhau tau na vijānītaḥ na ayam hanti na hanyate

original: 06,024.020a na jāyate mriyate vā kadā cin;
analyzed: na jāyate mriyate vā kadā cit

original: nāyaṃ bhūtvā bhavitā vā na bhūyaḥ
analyzed: na ayam bhūtvā bhavitā vā na bhūyas
ajaḥ nityaḥ śāśvataḥ yam purāṇaḥ
na hanyate hanyamāne śarīre

original: 06,024.021a vedāvināśinaṃ nityaṃ ya enam ajam avyayam
analyzed: veda avināśinam nityam yaḥ enam ajam avyayam

original: 06,024.021c kathaṃ sa puruṣaḥ pārtha kaṃ ghātayati hanti kam
analyzed: katham sa puruṣaḥ pārtha kam ghātayati hanti kam
vāsāṃsi jīrṇāni yathā vihāya
navāni gṛhṇāti naraḥ parāṇi
tathā śarīrāṇi vihāya jīrṇāni
anyāni saṃyāti navāni dehī

original: 06,024.023a nainaṃ chindanti śastrāṇi nainaṃ dahati pāvakaḥ
analyzed: na enam chindanti śastrāṇi na enam dahati pāvakaḥ

original: 06,024.023c na cainaṃ kledayanty āpo na śoṣayati mārutaḥ
analyzed: na ca enam kledayanti āpaḥ na śoṣayati mārutaḥ
acchedyaḥ yam a dāhyaḥ yam a kledyaḥ śoṣyaḥ eva ca
nityaḥ sarva gataḥ sthāṇuḥ acalaḥ yam sanātanaḥ
avyaktaḥ yam acintyaḥ yam avikāryaḥ yam ucyate
tasmāt evam viditvā enam na anuśocitum arhasi

original: 06,024.026a atha cainaṃ nityajātaṃ nityaṃ vā manyase mṛtam
analyzed: atha ca enam nitya jātam nityam vā manyase mṛtam

original: 06,024.026c tathāpi tvaṃ mahābāho nainaṃ śocitum arhasi
analyzed: tathā api tvam mahā bāho na enam śocitum arhasi

original: 06,024.027a jātasya hi dhruvo mṛtyur dhruvaṃ janma mṛtasya ca
analyzed: jātasya hi dhruvaḥ mṛtyuḥ dhruvam janma mṛtasya ca

original: 06,024.027c tasmād aparihārye 'rthe na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi
analyzed: tasmāt aparihārye rthe na tvam śocitum arhasi
avyakta ādīni bhūtāni vyakta madhyāni bhārata
avyakta nidhanāni eva tatra kā paridevanā
āścarya vat paśyati kaḥ cit enam
āścarya vat vadati tathā eva ca anyaḥ
āścarya vat ca enam anyaḥ śṛṇoti

original: śrutvāpy enaṃ veda na caiva kaś cit
analyzed: śrutvā api enam veda na ca eva kaḥ cit

original: 06,024.030a dehī nityam avadhyo 'yaṃ dehe sarvasya bhārata
analyzed: dehī nityam avadhyaḥ yam dehe sarvasya bhārata

original: 06,024.030c tasmāt sarvāṇi bhūtāni na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi
analyzed: tasmāt sarvāṇi bhūtāni na tvam śocitum arhasi

original: 06,024.031a svadharmam api cāvekṣya na vikampitum arhasi
analyzed: svadharmam api ca avekṣya na vikampitum arhasi

original: 06,024.031c dharmyād dhi yuddhāc chreyo 'nyat kṣatriyasya na vidyate
analyzed: dharmyāt hi yuddhāt śreyaḥ nyat kṣatriyasya na vidyate
yadṛcchayā ca upapannam svarga dvāram apāvṛtam

original: 06,024.032c sukhinaḥ kṣatriyāḥ pārtha labhante yuddham īdṛśam
analyzed: sukhinaḥ kṣatriyāḥ pārtha labhante yuddham īdṛśam

original: 06,024.033a atha cet tvam imaṃ dharmyaṃ saṃgrāmaṃ na kariṣyasi
analyzed: atha ced tvam imam dharmyam saṃgrāmam na kariṣyasi

original: 06,024.033c tataḥ svadharmaṃ kīrtiṃ ca hitvā pāpam avāpsyasi
analyzed: tatas svadharmam kīrtim ca hitvā pāpam avāpsyasi
akīrtim ca api bhūtāni kathayiṣyanti te vyayām
saṃbhāvitasya ca akīrtiḥ maraṇāt atiricyate

original: 06,024.035a bhayād raṇād uparataṃ maṃsyante tvāṃ mahārathāḥ
analyzed: bhayāt raṇāt uparatam maṃsyante tvām mahā rathāḥ

original: 06,024.035c yeṣāṃ ca tvaṃ bahumato bhūtvā yāsyasi lāghavam
analyzed: yeṣām ca tvam bahu mataḥ bhūtvā yāsyasi lāghavam
avācya vādān ca bahūn vadiṣyanti tava ahitāḥ

original: 06,024.036c nindantas tava sāmarthyaṃ tato duḥkhataraṃ nu kim
analyzed: nindantaḥ tava sāmarthyam tatas duḥkhataram nu kim

original: 06,024.037a hato vā prāpsyasi svargaṃ jitvā vā bhokṣyase mahīm
analyzed: hataḥ vā prāpsyasi svargam jitvā vā bhokṣyase mahīm
tasmāt uttiṣṭha kaunteya yuddhāya kṛta niścayaḥ
sukha duḥkhe same kṛtvā lābha alābhau jaya ajayau

original: 06,024.038c tato yuddhāya yujyasva naivaṃ pāpam avāpsyasi
analyzed: tatas yuddhāya yujyasva na evam pāpam avāpsyasi

original: 06,024.039a eṣā te 'bhihitā sāṃkhye buddhir yoge tv imāṃ śṛṇu
analyzed: eṣā te bhihitā sāṃkhye buddhiḥ yoge tu imām śṛṇu

original: 06,024.039c buddhyā yukto yayā pārtha karmabandhaṃ prahāsyasi
analyzed: buddhyā yuktaḥ yayā pārtha karma bandham prahāsyasi
na iha abhikrama nāśaḥ sti pratyavāyaḥ na vidyate

original: 06,024.040c svalpam apy asya dharmasya trāyate mahato bhayāt
analyzed: su alpam api asya dharmasya trāyate mahataḥ bhayāt
vyavasāya ātmikā buddhiḥ ekā iha kuru nandana
bahu śākhāḥ hi anantāḥ ca buddhayaḥ vyavasāyinām

original: 06,024.042a yām imāṃ puṣpitāṃ vācaṃ pravadanty avipaścitaḥ
analyzed: yām imām puṣpitām vācam pravadanti a vipaścitaḥ
veda vāda ratāḥ pārtha na anyat asti iti vādinaḥ
kāma ātmānaḥ svarga parāḥ janma karma phala pradām
kriyā viśeṣa bahulām bhoga aiśvarya gatim prati
bhoga aiśvarya prasaktānām tayā apahṛta cetasām
vyavasāya ātmikā buddhiḥ samādhau na vidhīyate
traiguṇya viṣayāḥ vedāḥ nistraiguṇyaḥ bhava arjuna
nirdvaṃdvaḥ nitya sattva sthaḥ niryogakṣemaḥ ātmavān
yāvān arthaḥ udapāne sarvatas saṃpluta udake
tāvān sarveṣu vedeṣu brāhmaṇasya vijānataḥ

original: 06,024.047a karmaṇy evādhikāras te mā phaleṣu kadā cana
analyzed: karmaṇi eva adhikāraḥ te mā phaleṣu kadā cana

original: 06,024.047c mā karmaphalahetur bhūr mā te saṅgo 'stv akarmaṇi
analyzed: mā karma phala hetuḥ bhūḥ mā te saṅgo stu akarmaṇi

original: 06,024.048a yogasthaḥ kuru karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā dhanaṃjaya
analyzed: yoga sthaḥ kuru karmāṇi saṅgam tyaktvā dhanaṃjaya

original: 06,024.048c siddhyasiddhyoḥ samo bhūtvā samatvaṃ yoga ucyate
analyzed: siddhi asiddhyoḥ samaḥ bhūtvā sama tvam yogaḥ ucyate

original: 06,024.048d*0088_01 yasya sarve samārambhā nirāśīrbandhanās tv iha
analyzed: yasya sarve samārambhāḥ tu iha

original: 06,024.048d*0088_02 tyāge yasya hutaṃ sarvaṃ sa tyāgī sa ca buddhimān
analyzed: tyāge yasya hutam sarvam sa tyāgī sa ca buddhimān

original: 06,024.049a dūreṇa hy avaraṃ karma buddhiyogād dhanaṃjaya
analyzed: dūreṇa hi avaram karma buddhi yogāt dhanaṃjaya
buddhau śaraṇam anviccha kṛpaṇāḥ phala hetavaḥ
buddhi yuktaḥ jahāti iha ubhe sukṛta duṣkṛte

original: 06,024.050c tasmād yogāya yujyasva yogaḥ karmasu kauśalam
analyzed: tasmāt yogāya yujyasva yogaḥ karmasu kauśalam

original: 06,024.051a karmajaṃ buddhiyuktā hi phalaṃ tyaktvā manīṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: karma jam buddhi yuktāḥ hi phalam tyaktvā manīṣiṇaḥ
janma bandha vinirmuktāḥ padam gacchanti anāmayam
yadā te moha kalilam buddhiḥ vyatitariṣyati

original: 06,024.052c tadā gantāsi nirvedaṃ śrotavyasya śrutasya ca
analyzed: tadā gantāsi nirvedam śrotavyasya śrutasya ca
śruti vipratipannā te yadā sthāsyati niścalā

original: 06,024.053c samādhāv acalā buddhis tadā yogam avāpsyasi
analyzed: samādhau acalā buddhiḥ tadā yogam avāpsyasi
arjunaḥ uvāca
sthita prajñasya kā bhāṣā samādhi sthasya keśava

original: 06,024.054c sthitadhīḥ kiṃ prabhāṣeta kim āsīta vrajeta kim
analyzed: sthita dhīḥ kim prabhāṣeta kim āsīta vrajeta kim
śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: 06,024.055a prajahāti yadā kāmān sarvān pārtha manogatān
analyzed: prajahāti yadā kāmān sarvān pārtha manaḥ gatān
ātmani eva ātmanā tuṣṭaḥ sthita prajñaḥ tadā ucyate
duḥkheṣu anudvigna manāḥ sukheṣu vigata spṛhaḥ
vīta rāga bhaya krodhaḥ sthita dhīḥ muniḥ ucyate

original: 06,024.057a yaḥ sarvatrānabhisnehas tat tat prāpya śubhāśubham
analyzed: yaḥ sarvatra anabhisnehaḥ tat tat prāpya śubha aśubham

original: 06,024.057c nābhinandati na dveṣṭi tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā
analyzed: na abhinandati na dveṣṭi tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā
yadā saṃharate ca ayam kūrmaḥ u ṅgāni iva sarvaśas
indriyāṇi indriya arthebhyaḥ tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā
viṣayāḥ vinivartante nirāhārasya dehinaḥ

original: 06,024.059c rasavarjaṃ raso 'py asya paraṃ dṛṣṭvā nivartate
analyzed: rasa varjam asya param dṛṣṭvā nivartate

original: 06,024.060a yatato hy api kaunteya puruṣasya vipaścitaḥ
analyzed: yatataḥ hi api kaunteya puruṣasya vipaścitaḥ
indriyāṇi pramāthīni haranti prasabham manaḥ

original: 06,024.061a tāni sarvāṇi saṃyamya yukta āsīta matparaḥ
analyzed: tāni sarvāṇi saṃyamya yuktaḥ āsīta mad paraḥ

original: 06,024.061c vaśe hi yasyendriyāṇi tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā
analyzed: vaśe hi yasya indriyāṇi tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā
dhyāyataḥ viṣayān puṃsaḥ saṅgaḥ teṣu upajāyate
saṅgāt saṃjāyate kāmaḥ kāmāt krodhaḥ bhijāyate
krodhāt bhavati saṃmohaḥ saṃmohāt smṛti vibhramaḥ
smṛti bhraṃśāt buddhi nāśaḥ buddhi nāśāt praṇaśyati
rāga dveṣa viyuktaiḥ tu viṣayān indriyaiḥ caran
ātma vaśyaiḥ vidheya ātmā prasādam adhigacchati
prasāde sarva duḥkhānām hāniḥ asya upajāyate
prasanna cetasaḥ hi āśu buddhiḥ paryavatiṣṭhate

original: 06,024.066a nāsti buddhir ayuktasya na cāyuktasya bhāvanā
analyzed: na asti buddhiḥ ayuktasya na ca ayuktasya bhāvanā

original: 06,024.066c na cābhāvayataḥ śāntir aśāntasya kutaḥ sukham
analyzed: na ca abhāvayataḥ śāntiḥ aśāntasya kutas sukham
indriyāṇām hi caratām yat manaḥ nuvidhīyate

original: 06,024.067c tad asya harati prajñāṃ vāyur nāvam ivāmbhasi
analyzed: tat asya harati prajñām vāyuḥ nāvam iva ambhasi
tasmāt yasya mahā bāho nigṛhītāni sarvaśas
indriyāṇi indriya arthebhyaḥ tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā

original: 06,024.069a yā niśā sarvabhūtānāṃ tasyāṃ jāgarti saṃyamī
analyzed: yā niśā sarva bhūtānām tasyām jāgarti saṃyamī

original: 06,024.069c yasyāṃ jāgrati bhūtāni sā niśā paśyato muneḥ
analyzed: yasyām jāgrati bhūtāni sā niśā paśyataḥ muneḥ
āpūryamāṇam acala pratiṣṭham
samudram āpaḥ praviśanti yadvat
tadvat kāmāḥ yam praviśanti sarve
sa śāntim āpnoti na kāma kāmī

original: 06,024.071a vihāya kāmān yaḥ sarvān pumāṃś carati niḥspṛhaḥ
analyzed: vihāya kāmān yaḥ sarvān pumān carati niḥspṛhaḥ
nirmamaḥ nirahaṃkāraḥ sa śāntim adhigacchati

original: 06,024.072a eṣā brāhmī sthitiḥ pārtha naināṃ prāpya vimuhyati
analyzed: eṣā brāhmī sthitiḥ pārtha na enām prāpya vimuhyati
sthitvā asyām anta kāle brahma nirvāṇam ṛcchati
arjunaḥ uvāca

original: 06,025.001a jyāyasī cet karmaṇas te matā buddhir janārdana
analyzed: jyāyasī ced karmaṇaḥ te matā buddhiḥ janārdana

original: 06,025.001c tat kiṃ karmaṇi ghore māṃ niyojayasi keśava
analyzed: tat kim karmaṇi ghore mām niyojayasi keśava
vyāmiśreṇa eva vākyena buddhim mohayasi iva me

original: 06,025.002c tad ekaṃ vada niścitya yena śreyo 'ham āpnuyām
analyzed: tat ekam vada niścitya yena śreyaḥ ham āpnuyām
śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: 06,025.003a loke 'smin dvividhā niṣṭhā purā proktā mayānagha
analyzed: loke smin dvividhā niṣṭhā purā proktā mayā anagha
jñāna yogena sāṃkhyānām karma yogena yoginām
na karmaṇām anārambhāt naiṣkarmyam śnute

original: 06,025.004c na ca saṃnyasanād eva siddhiṃ samadhigacchati
analyzed: na ca saṃnyasanāt eva siddhim samadhigacchati

original: 06,025.005a na hi kaś cit kṣaṇam api jātu tiṣṭhaty akarmakṛt
analyzed: na hi kaḥ cit kṣaṇam api jātu tiṣṭhati a karma kṛt

original: 06,025.005c kāryate hy avaśaḥ karma sarvaḥ prakṛtijair guṇaiḥ
analyzed: kāryate hi avaśaḥ karma sarvaḥ prakṛti jaiḥ guṇaiḥ

original: 06,025.006a karmendriyāṇi saṃyamya ya āste manasā smaran
analyzed: karmendriyāṇi saṃyamya yaḥ āste manasā smaran
indriya arthān vimūḍha ātmā mithyā ācāraḥ saḥ ucyate
yaḥ tu indriyāṇi manasā niyamya ārabhate rjuna
karmendriyaiḥ karma yogam asaktaḥ sa viśiṣyate

original: 06,025.008a niyataṃ kuru karma tvaṃ karma jyāyo hy akarmaṇaḥ
analyzed: niyatam kuru karma tvam karma jyāyaḥ hi akarmaṇaḥ

original: 06,025.008c śarīrayātrāpi ca te na prasidhyed akarmaṇaḥ
analyzed: śarīra yātrā api ca te na prasidhyet a karmaṇaḥ
yajña arthāt karmaṇaḥ nyatra lokaḥ yam karma bandhanaḥ
tad artham karma kaunteya mukta saṅgaḥ samācara
saha yajñāḥ prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā purā uvāca prajāpatiḥ
anena prasaviṣyadhvam eṣa vaḥ stu iṣṭa kāmadhuk

original: 06,025.011a devān bhāvayatānena te devā bhāvayantu vaḥ
analyzed: devān bhāvayata anena te devāḥ bhāvayantu vaḥ

original: 06,035.021a puruṣaḥ prakṛtistho hi bhuṅkte prakṛtijān guṇān

original: 06,036.002a idaṃ jñānam upāśritya mama sādharmyam āgatāḥ

sukha saṅgena badhnāti jñāna saṅgena ca anagha

original: 06,036.008a tamas tv ajñānajaṃ viddhi mohanaṃ sarvadehinām
analyzed: tamaḥ tu ajñāna jam viddhi mohanam sarva dehinām

original: 06,036.009a sattvaṃ sukhe sañjayati rajaḥ karmaṇi bhārata

original: 06,036.010a rajas tamaś cābhibhūya sattvaṃ bhavati bhārata

original: 06,036.011c jñānaṃ yadā tadā vidyād vivṛddhaṃ sattvam ity uta

original: 06,036.012a lobhaḥ pravṛttir ārambhaḥ karmaṇām aśamaḥ spṛhā

original: 06,036.013a aprakāśo 'pravṛttiś ca pramādo moha eva ca

original: 06,036.014a yadā sattve pravṛddhe tu pralayaṃ yāti dehabhṛt

original: 06,036.016c rajasas tu phalaṃ duḥkham ajñānaṃ tamasaḥ phalam

original: 06,036.017a sattvāt saṃjāyate jñānaṃ rajaso lobha eva ca

original: 06,037.018a yasmāt kṣaram atīto 'ham akṣarād api cottamaḥ

original: 06,037.018c ato 'smi loke vede ca prathitaḥ puruṣottamaḥ

original: 06,038.002a ahiṃsā satyam akrodhas tyāgaḥ śāntir apaiśunam

original: 06,038.002c dayā bhūteṣv aloluptvaṃ mārdavaṃ hrīr acāpalam

original: 06,038.003a tejaḥ kṣamā dhṛtiḥ śaucam adroho nātimānitā

original: 06,038.006a dvau bhūtasargau loke 'smin daiva āsura eva ca

original: 06,038.006c daivo vistaraśaḥ prokta āsuraṃ pārtha me śṛṇu

original: 06,038.007a pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca janā na vidur āsurāḥ

original: 06,038.008a asatyam apratiṣṭhaṃ te jagad āhur anīśvaram

original: 06,038.013a idam adya mayā labdham idaṃ prāpsye manoratham

original: 06,038.013c idam astīdam api me bhaviṣyati punar dhanam

analyzed: mām a prāpya eva kaunteya tatas yānti adhamām gatim

original: 06,038.021c kāmaḥ krodhas tathā lobhas tasmād etat trayaṃ tyajet
analyzed: kāmaḥ krodhaḥ tathā lobhaḥ tasmāt etat trayam tyajet

original: 06,038.022a etair vimuktaḥ kaunteya tamodvārais tribhir naraḥ
analyzed: etaiḥ vimuktaḥ kaunteya tamaḥ dvāraiḥ tribhiḥ naraḥ

original: 06,038.022c ācaraty ātmanaḥ śreyas tato yāti parāṃ gatim
analyzed: ācarati ātmanaḥ śreyaḥ tatas yāti parām gatim

original: 06,038.023c na sa siddhim avāpnoti na sukhaṃ na parāṃ gatim
analyzed: na sa siddhim avāpnoti na sukham na parām gatim
tasmāt śāstram pramāṇam te kārya akārya vyavasthitau

ye śāstra vidhim utsṛjya yajante śraddhayā anvitāḥ

original: 06,039.001c teṣāṃ niṣṭhā tu kā kṛṣṇa sattvam āho rajas tamaḥ
analyzed: teṣām niṣṭhā tu kā kṛṣṇa sattvam āho rajaḥ tamaḥ
śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: 06,039.002a trividhā bhavati śraddhā dehināṃ sā svabhāvajā
analyzed: trividhā bhavati śraddhā dehinām sā svabhāva jā

original: 06,039.002c sāttvikī rājasī caiva tāmasī ceti tāṃ śṛṇu
analyzed: sāttvikī rājasī ca eva tāmasī ca iti tām śṛṇu
sattva anurūpā sarvasya śraddhā bhavati bhārata

original: 06,039.003c śraddhāmayo 'yaṃ puruṣo yo yacchraddhaḥ sa eva saḥ
analyzed: śraddhā mayaḥ yam puruṣaḥ yaḥ yad śraddhaḥ saḥ eva saḥ
yajante sāttvikāḥ devān yakṣa rakṣāṃsi rājasāḥ

original: 06,039.004c pretān bhūtagaṇāṃś cānye yajante tāmasā janāḥ
analyzed: pretān bhūta gaṇān ca anye yajante tāmasāḥ janāḥ

original: 06,039.005a aśāstravihitaṃ ghoraṃ tapyante ye tapo janāḥ
analyzed: a śāstra vihitam ghoram tapyante ye tapaḥ janāḥ
dambha ahaṃkāra saṃyuktāḥ kāma rāga bala anvitāḥ
karśayantaḥ śarīra stham bhūta grāmam acetasaḥ
mām ca eva antar śarīra stham tān viddhi āsura niścayān

original: 06,039.007a āhāras tv api sarvasya trividho bhavati priyaḥ
analyzed: āhāraḥ tu api sarvasya trividhaḥ bhavati priyaḥ

original: 06,039.007c yajñas tapas tathā dānaṃ teṣāṃ bhedam imaṃ śṛṇu
analyzed: yajñaḥ tapaḥ tathā dānam teṣām bhedam imam śṛṇu
āyuḥ sattva bala ārogya sukha prīti vivardhanāḥ

original: 06,039.008c rasyāḥ snigdhāḥ sthirā hṛdyā āhārāḥ sāttvikapriyāḥ
analyzed: rasyāḥ snigdhāḥ sthirāḥ hṛdyāḥ āhārāḥ sāttvika priyāḥ
āhārāḥ rājasasya iṣṭāḥ duḥkha śoka āmaya pradāḥ

original: 06,039.010a yātayāmaṃ gatarasaṃ pūti paryuṣitaṃ ca yat
analyzed: yātayāmam gata rasam pūti paryuṣitam ca yat
ucchiṣṭam api ca amedhyam bhojanam tāmasa priyam
a phala ākāṅkṣibhiḥ yajñaḥ vidhi dṛṣṭaḥ yaḥ ijyate

original: 06,039.011c yaṣṭavyam eveti manaḥ samādhāya sa sāttvikaḥ
analyzed: yaṣṭavyam eva iti manaḥ samādhāya sa sāttvikaḥ

original: 06,039.012a abhisaṃdhāya tu phalaṃ dambhārtham api caiva yat
analyzed: abhisaṃdhāya tu phalam dambha artham api ca eva yat

original: 06,039.012c ijyate bharataśreṣṭha taṃ yajñaṃ viddhi rājasam
analyzed: ijyate bharata śreṣṭha tam yajñam viddhi rājasam
vidhi hīnam a sṛṣṭa annam mantra hīnam a dakṣiṇam
śraddhā virahitam yajñam tāmasam paricakṣate
deva dvija guru prājña pūjanam śaucam ārjavam

original: 06,039.014c brahmacaryam ahiṃsā ca śārīraṃ tapa ucyate
analyzed: brahmacaryam ahiṃsā ca śārīram tapaḥ ucyate

original: 06,039.015a anudvegakaraṃ vākyaṃ satyaṃ priyahitaṃ ca yat
analyzed: an udvega karam vākyam satyam priya hitam ca yat
svādhyāya abhyasanam ca eva vāc mayam tapaḥ ucyate

original: 06,039.016c bhāvasaṃśuddhir ity etat tapo mānasam ucyate
analyzed: bhāva saṃśuddhiḥ iti etat tapaḥ mānasam ucyate

original: 06,039.017a śraddhayā parayā taptaṃ tapas tat trividhaṃ naraiḥ
analyzed: śraddhayā parayā taptam tapaḥ tat trividham naraiḥ
a phala ākāṅkṣibhiḥ yuktaiḥ sāttvikam paricakṣate
satkāra māna pūjā artham tapaḥ dambhena ca eva yat

original: 06,039.018c kriyate tad iha proktaṃ rājasaṃ calam adhruvam
analyzed: kriyate tat iha proktam rājasam calam adhruvam
mūḍha grāheṇa ātmanaḥ yat pīḍayā kriyate tapaḥ
parasya utsādana artham vā tat tāmasam udāhṛtam
dātavyam iti yat dānam dīyate n upakāriṇe

original: 06,039.020c deśe kāle ca pātre ca tad dānaṃ sāttvikaṃ smṛtam
analyzed: deśe kāle ca pātre ca tat dānam sāttvikam smṛtam

original: 06,039.021a yat tu pratyupakārārthaṃ phalam uddiśya vā punaḥ
analyzed: yat tu pratyupakāra artham phalam uddiśya vā punar

original: 06,039.021c dīyate ca parikliṣṭaṃ tad dānaṃ rājasaṃ smṛtam
analyzed: dīyate ca parikliṣṭam tat dānam rājasam smṛtam

original: 06,039.022a adeśakāle yad dānam apātrebhyaś ca dīyate
analyzed: a deśa kāle yat dānam apātrebhyaḥ ca dīyate
asatkṛtam avajñātam tat tāmasam udāhṛtam

original: 06,039.023a oṃ tat sad iti nirdeśo brahmaṇas trividhaḥ smṛtaḥ
analyzed: om tat sat iti nirdeśaḥ brahmaṇaḥ trividhaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: 06,039.023c brāhmaṇās tena vedāś ca yajñāś ca vihitāḥ purā
analyzed: brāhmaṇāḥ tena vedāḥ ca yajñāḥ ca vihitāḥ purā
tasmāt om iti udāhṛtya yajña dāna tapaḥ kriyāḥ
pravartante vidhāna uktāḥ satatam brahma vādinām
tat iti an abhisaṃdhāya phalam yajña tapaḥ kriyāḥ
dāna kriyāḥ ca vividhāḥ kriyante mokṣa kāṅkṣibhiḥ

original: 06,039.026a sadbhāve sādhubhāve ca sad ity etat prayujyate
analyzed: sadbhāve sādhu bhāve ca sat iti etat prayujyate

original: 06,039.026c praśaste karmaṇi tathā sacchabdaḥ pārtha yujyate
analyzed: praśaste karmaṇi tathā sat śabdaḥ pārtha yujyate

original: 06,039.027a yajñe tapasi dāne ca sthitiḥ sad iti cocyate
analyzed: yajñe tapasi dāne ca sthitiḥ sat iti ca ucyate

original: 06,039.027c karma caiva tadarthīyaṃ sad ity evābhidhīyate
analyzed: karma ca eva tad arthīyam sat iti eva abhidhīyate

original: 06,039.028a aśraddhayā hutaṃ dattaṃ tapas taptaṃ kṛtaṃ ca yat
analyzed: aśraddhayā hutam dattam tapaḥ taptam kṛtam ca yat

original: 06,039.028c asad ity ucyate pārtha na ca tat pretya no iha
analyzed: asat iti ucyate pārtha na ca tat pretya no iha
arjunaḥ uvāca
saṃnyāsasya mahā bāho tattvam icchāmi veditum
tyāgasya ca hṛṣīkeśa pṛthak keśiniṣūdana
śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: 06,040.002a kāmyānāṃ karmaṇāṃ nyāsaṃ saṃnyāsaṃ kavayo viduḥ
analyzed: kāmyānām karmaṇām nyāsam saṃnyāsam kavayaḥ viduḥ
sarva karma phala tyāgam prāhuḥ tyāgam vicakṣaṇāḥ

original: 06,040.003a tyājyaṃ doṣavad ity eke karma prāhur manīṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: tyājyam doṣavat iti eke karma prāhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ
yajña dāna tapaḥ karma na tyājyam iti ca apare

original: 06,040.004a niścayaṃ śṛṇu me tatra tyāge bharatasattama
analyzed: niścayam śṛṇu me tatra tyāge bharata sattama
tyāgaḥ hi puruṣa vyāghra trividhaḥ saṃprakīrtitaḥ

original: 06,040.005a yajñadānatapaḥkarma na tyājyaṃ kāryam eva tat

original: 06,040.005c yajño dānaṃ tapaś caiva pāvanāni manīṣiṇām
analyzed: yajñaḥ dānam tapaḥ ca eva pāvanāni manīṣiṇām

original: 06,040.006a etāny api tu karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā phalāni ca
analyzed: etāni api tu karmāṇi saṅgam tyaktvā phalāni ca

original: 06,040.006c kartavyānīti me pārtha niścitaṃ matam uttamam
analyzed: kartavyāni iti me pārtha niścitam matam uttamam
niyatasya tu saṃnyāsaḥ karmaṇaḥ na upapadyate

original: 06,040.008a duḥkham ity eva yat karma kāyakleśabhayāt tyajet
analyzed: duḥkham iti eva yat karma kāya kleśa bhayāt tyajet

original: 06,040.008c sa kṛtvā rājasaṃ tyāgaṃ naiva tyāgaphalaṃ labhet
analyzed: sa kṛtvā rājasam tyāgam na eva tyāga phalam labhet

original: 06,040.009a kāryam ity eva yat karma niyataṃ kriyate 'rjuna
analyzed: kāryam iti eva yat karma niyatam kriyate rjuna

original: 06,040.009c saṅgaṃ tyaktvā phalaṃ caiva sa tyāgaḥ sāttviko mataḥ
analyzed: saṅgam tyaktvā phalam ca eva sa tyāgaḥ sāttvikaḥ mataḥ

original: 06,040.010a na dveṣṭy akuśalaṃ karma kuśale nānuṣajjate
analyzed: na dveṣṭi akuśalam karma kuśale na anuṣajjate
tyāgī sattva samāviṣṭaḥ medhāvī chinna saṃśayaḥ

original: 06,040.011a na hi dehabhṛtā śakyaṃ tyaktuṃ karmāṇy aśeṣataḥ
analyzed: na hi dehabhṛtā śakyam tyaktum karmāṇi aśeṣatas

original: 06,040.011c yas tu karmaphalatyāgī sa tyāgīty abhidhīyate
analyzed: yaḥ tu karma phala tyāgī sa tyāgī iti abhidhīyate

original: 06,040.012a aniṣṭam iṣṭaṃ miśraṃ ca trividhaṃ karmaṇaḥ phalam
analyzed: aniṣṭam iṣṭam miśram ca trividham karmaṇaḥ phalam

original: 06,040.012c bhavaty atyāgināṃ pretya na tu saṃnyāsināṃ kva cit
analyzed: bhavati atyāginām pretya na tu saṃnyāsinām kva cit
pañca etāni mahā bāho kāraṇāni nibodha me

original: 06,040.014a adhiṣṭhānaṃ tathā kartā karaṇaṃ ca pṛthagvidham
analyzed: adhiṣṭhānam tathā kartā karaṇam ca pṛthagvidham

original: 06,040.014c vividhāś ca pṛthakceṣṭā daivaṃ caivātra pañcamam

original: 06,040.015c nyāyyaṃ vā viparītaṃ vā pañcaite tasya hetavaḥ
analyzed: nyāyyam vā viparītam vā pañca ete tasya hetavaḥ

original: 06,040.016a tatraivaṃ sati kartāram ātmānaṃ kevalaṃ tu yaḥ
analyzed: tatra evam sati kartāram ātmānam kevalam tu yaḥ

original: 06,040.016c paśyaty akṛtabuddhitvān na sa paśyati durmatiḥ

original: 06,040.017a yasya nāhaṃkṛto bhāvo buddhir yasya na lipyate
analyzed: yasya na ahaṃkṛtaḥ bhāvaḥ buddhiḥ yasya na lipyate

original: 06,040.017c hatvāpi sa imāṃl lokān na hanti na nibadhyate
analyzed: hatvā api saḥ imān lokān na hanti na nibadhyate
jñānam jñeyam parijñātā trividhā karma codanā
karaṇam karma kartā iti trividhaḥ karma saṃgrahaḥ

original: 06,040.019a jñānaṃ karma ca kartā ca tridhaiva guṇabhedataḥ
analyzed: jñānam karma ca kartā ca tridhā eva guṇa bhedataḥ

original: 06,040.019c procyate guṇasaṃkhyāne yathāvac chṛṇu tāny api
analyzed: procyate guṇa saṃkhyāne yathāvat śṛṇu tāni api

original: 06,040.020c avibhaktaṃ vibhakteṣu taj jñānaṃ viddhi sāttvikam
analyzed: avibhaktam vibhakteṣu tat jñānam viddhi sāttvikam

original: 06,040.021a pṛthaktvena tu yaj jñānaṃ nānābhāvān pṛthagvidhān
analyzed: pṛthaktvena tu yat jñānam nānā bhāvān pṛthagvidhān

original: 06,040.021c vetti sarveṣu bhūteṣu taj jñānaṃ viddhi rājasam
analyzed: vetti sarveṣu bhūteṣu tat jñānam viddhi rājasam

original: 06,040.022a yat tu kṛtsnavad ekasmin kārye saktam ahaitukam
analyzed: yat tu kṛtsna vat ekasmin kārye saktam ahaitukam

original: 06,040.022c atattvārthavad alpaṃ ca tat tāmasam udāhṛtam
analyzed: a tattva arthavat alpam ca tat tāmasam udāhṛtam
niyatam saṅga rahitam a rāga dveṣataḥ kṛtam

original: 06,040.023c aphalaprepsunā karma yat tat sāttvikam ucyate
analyzed: a phala prepsunā karma yat tat sāttvikam ucyate

original: 06,040.024a yat tu kāmepsunā karma sāhaṃkāreṇa vā punaḥ
analyzed: yat tu kāma īpsunā karma sa ahaṃkāreṇa vā punar

original: 06,040.025a anubandhaṃ kṣayaṃ hiṃsām anapekṣya ca pauruṣam
analyzed: anubandham kṣayam hiṃsām an apekṣya ca pauruṣam

original: 06,040.025c mohād ārabhyate karma yat tat tāmasam ucyate
analyzed: mohāt ārabhyate karma yat tat tāmasam ucyate
mukta saṅgaḥ na ahaṃvādī dhṛti utsāha samanvitaḥ
siddhi asiddhyoḥ nirvikāraḥ kartā sāttvikaḥ ucyate
rāgī karma phala prepsuḥ lubdhaḥ śuciḥ
harṣa śoka anvitaḥ kartā rājasaḥ parikīrtitaḥ
ayuktaḥ prākṛtaḥ stabdhaḥ śaṭhaḥ naikṛtikaḥ lasaḥ

original: 06,040.028c viṣādī dīrghasūtrī ca kartā tāmasa ucyate
analyzed: viṣādī dīrghasūtrī ca kartā tāmasaḥ ucyate

original: 06,040.029a buddher bhedaṃ dhṛteś caiva guṇatas trividhaṃ śṛṇu
analyzed: buddheḥ bhedam dhṛteḥ ca eva guṇataḥ trividham śṛṇu

original: 06,040.030a pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca kāryākārye bhayābhaye
analyzed: pravṛttim ca nivṛttim ca kārya akārye bhaya abhaye

original: 06,040.030c bandhaṃ mokṣaṃ ca yā vetti buddhiḥ sā pārtha sāttvikī
analyzed: bandham mokṣam ca yā vetti buddhiḥ sā pārtha sāttvikī

original: 06,040.031a yayā dharmam adharmaṃ ca kāryaṃ cākāryam eva ca
analyzed: yayā dharmam adharmam ca kāryam ca akāryam eva ca

original: 06,040.031c ayathāvat prajānāti buddhiḥ sā pārtha rājasī
analyzed: ayathāvat prajānāti buddhiḥ sā pārtha rājasī

original: 06,040.032a adharmaṃ dharmam iti yā manyate tamasāvṛtā
analyzed: adharmam dharmam iti yā manyate tamasā āvṛtā

original: 06,040.032c sarvārthān viparītāṃś ca buddhiḥ sā pārtha tāmasī
analyzed: sarva arthān viparītān ca buddhiḥ sā pārtha tāmasī
dhṛtyā yayā dhārayate manaḥ prāṇa indriya kriyāḥ
yogena avyabhicāriṇyā dhṛtiḥ sā pārtha sāttvikī
yayā tu dharma kāma arthān dhṛtyā dhārayate rjuna

original: 06,040.034c prasaṅgena phalākāṅkṣī dhṛtiḥ sā pārtha rājasī
analyzed: prasaṅgena phala ākāṅkṣī dhṛtiḥ sā pārtha rājasī

original: 06,040.035a yayā svapnaṃ bhayaṃ śokaṃ viṣādaṃ madam eva ca
analyzed: yayā svapnam bhayam śokam viṣādam madam eva ca

original: 06,040.035c na vimuñcati durmedhā dhṛtiḥ sā pārtha tāmasī
analyzed: na vimuñcati durmedhāḥ dhṛtiḥ sā pārtha tāmasī

original: 06,040.036a sukhaṃ tv idānīṃ trividhaṃ śṛṇu me bharatarṣabha
analyzed: sukham tu idānīm trividham śṛṇu me bharata ṛṣabha

original: 06,040.036c abhyāsād ramate yatra duḥkhāntaṃ ca nigacchati
analyzed: abhyāsāt ramate yatra duḥkha antam ca nigacchati
yat tat agre viṣam iva pariṇāme mṛta upamam
tat sukham sāttvikam proktam ātma buddhi prasāda jam
viṣaya indriya saṃyogāt yat tat agre mṛta upamam

original: 06,040.038c pariṇāme viṣam iva tat sukhaṃ rājasaṃ smṛtam
analyzed: pariṇāme viṣam iva tat sukham rājasam smṛtam

original: 06,040.039a yad agre cānubandhe ca sukhaṃ mohanam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: yat agre ca anubandhe ca sukham mohanam ātmanaḥ
nidrā ālasya pramāda uttham tat tāmasam udāhṛtam

original: 06,040.040a na tad asti pṛthivyāṃ vā divi deveṣu vā punaḥ
analyzed: na tat asti pṛthivyām vā divi deveṣu vā punar

original: 06,040.040c sattvaṃ prakṛtijair muktaṃ yad ebhiḥ syāt tribhir guṇaiḥ
analyzed: sattvam prakṛti jaiḥ muktam yat ebhiḥ syāt tribhiḥ guṇaiḥ
brāhmaṇa kṣatriya viśām śūdrāṇām ca paraṃtapa
karmāṇi pravibhaktāni svabhāva prabhavaiḥ guṇaiḥ

original: 06,040.042a śamo damas tapaḥ śaucaṃ kṣāntir ārjavam eva ca
analyzed: śamaḥ damaḥ tapaḥ śaucam kṣāntiḥ ārjavam eva ca
jñānam vijñānam āstikyam brahma karma svabhāva jam

original: 06,040.043a śauryaṃ tejo dhṛtir dākṣyaṃ yuddhe cāpy apalāyanam
analyzed: śauryam tejaḥ dhṛtiḥ dākṣyam yuddhe ca api apalāyanam
dānam īśvara bhāvaḥ ca kṣatra karma svabhāva jam
kṛṣi gorakṣya vāṇijyam vaiśya karma svabhāva jam
paricaryā ātmakam karma śūdrasya api svabhāva jam

original: 06,040.045a sve sve karmaṇy abhirataḥ saṃsiddhiṃ labhate naraḥ
analyzed: sve sve karmaṇi abhirataḥ saṃsiddhim labhate naraḥ

original: 06,040.045c svakarmanirataḥ siddhiṃ yathā vindati tac chṛṇu
analyzed: sva karma nirataḥ siddhim yathā vindati tat śṛṇu

original: 06,040.046a yataḥ pravṛttir bhūtānāṃ yena sarvam idaṃ tatam
analyzed: yatas pravṛttiḥ bhūtānām yena sarvam idam tatam

original: 06,040.046c svakarmaṇā tam abhyarcya siddhiṃ vindati mānavaḥ
analyzed: sva karmaṇā tam abhyarcya siddhim vindati mānavaḥ
śreyān svadharmaḥ viguṇaḥ para dharmāt su anuṣṭhitāt
svadharme nidhanam śreyaḥ para dharma udayāt api
svabhāva niyatam karma kurvan na āpnoti kilbiṣam

original: 06,045.043d@004_0009 bṛhadbalaś ca kausalyo jayatsenaś ca māgadhaḥ
analyzed: bṛhadbalaḥ ca kausalyaḥ jayatsenaḥ ca māgadhaḥ

nānā varṇa vicitrāṇi dhanūṃṣi ca mahātmanām

analyzed: te tu bāṇa mayam varṣam śveta mūrdhani apātayan

original: 06,045.043d@004_0019 nikṛttāny eva tāni sma samadṛśyanta bhārata

analyzed: tatas punar ameya ātmā bhallaiḥ saptabhiḥ āśugaiḥ

ratha śaktīḥ parāmṛśya vineduḥ bhairavān ravān
anvayuḥ bharata śreṣṭha sapta śvetaratham prati
tatas tāḥ jvalitāḥ sapta mahā indra aśani nisvanāḥ
aprāptāḥ saptabhiḥ bhallaiḥ ciccheda parama astra vid
tatas samādāya śaram sarva kāya vidāraṇam
prāhiṇot bharata śreṣṭha śvetaḥ rukmaratham prati

original: 06,045.043d@004_0031 tasya dehe nipatito bāṇo vajrātigo mahān

tatas rukmarathaḥ rājan sāyakena dṛḍha āhataḥ

original: 06,045.043d@004_0034 taṃ visaṃjñaṃ vimanasaṃ tvaramāṇas tu sārathiḥ
analyzed: tam visaṃjñam vimanasam tvaramāṇaḥ tu sārathiḥ

original: 06,045.043d@004_0038 hayāṃś ca teṣāṃ nirbhidya sārathīṃś ca paraṃtapa

analyzed: śaraiḥ ca etān samākīrya prāyāt śalya ratham prati

analyzed: dṛṣṭvā senāpatim tūrṇam yāntam śalya ratham prati

original: 06,045.043d@004_0042 tato bhīṣmaṃ puraskṛtya tava putro mahābalaḥ
analyzed: tatas bhīṣmam puraskṛtya tava putraḥ mahā balaḥ

original: 06,045.043d@004_0043 vṛtas tu sarvasainyena prāyāc chvetarathaṃ prati
analyzed: vṛtaḥ tu sarva sainyena prāyāt śvetaratham prati

analyzed: kaikeye ca virāṭe ca dhṛṣṭadyumne ca pārṣate

analyzed: ādhāva abhyehi mā gaccha kim bhītaḥ si kva yāsyasi

original: 06,055.018c sthito 'haṃ samare mā bhair iti cānye vicukruśuḥ
analyzed: sthitaḥ ham samare mā bhaiḥ iti ca anye vicukruśuḥ
tatra bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavaḥ nityam maṇḍala kārmukaḥ

original: 06,055.019c mumoca bāṇān dīptāgrān ahīn āśīviṣān iva
analyzed: mumoca bāṇān dīpta agrān ahīn āśīviṣān iva
śaraiḥ ekāyanīkurvan diśaḥ sarvāḥ yata vrataḥ
jaghāna pāṇḍava rathān ādiśya ādiśya bhārata

original: 06,055.021a sa nṛtyan vai rathopasthe darśayan pāṇilāghavam
analyzed: sa nṛtyan vai rathopasthe darśayan pāṇi lāghavam

original: 06,055.021c alātacakravad rājaṃs tatra tatra sma dṛśyate
analyzed: alāta cakra vat rājan tatra tatra sma dṛśyate

original: 06,055.022a tam ekaṃ samare śūraṃ pāṇḍavāḥ sṛñjayās tathā
analyzed: tam ekam samare śūram pāṇḍavāḥ sṛñjayāḥ tathā
aneka śata sāhasram samapaśyanta lāghavāt

original: 06,055.023a māyākṛtātmānam iva bhīṣmaṃ tatra sma menire
analyzed: māyā kṛta ātmānam iva bhīṣmam tatra sma menire

original: 06,055.023c pūrvasyāṃ diśi taṃ dṛṣṭvā pratīcyāṃ dadṛśur janāḥ
analyzed: pūrvasyām diśi tam dṛṣṭvā pratīcyām dadṛśuḥ janāḥ

original: 06,055.024a udīcyāṃ cainam ālokya dakṣiṇasyāṃ punaḥ prabho
analyzed: udīcyām ca enam ālokya dakṣiṇasyām punar prabho

original: 06,055.024c evaṃ sa samare vīro gāṅgeyaḥ pratyadṛśyata
analyzed: evam sa samare vīraḥ gāṅgeyaḥ pratyadṛśyata

original: 06,055.025a na cainaṃ pāṇḍaveyānāṃ kaś cic chaknoti vīkṣitum
analyzed: na ca enam pāṇḍaveyānām kaḥ cit śaknoti vīkṣitum
viśikhān eva paśyanti bhīṣma cāpa cyutān bahūn

original: 06,055.026a kurvāṇaṃ samare karma sūdayānaṃ ca vāhinīm
analyzed: kurvāṇam samare karma sūdayānam ca vāhinīm

original: 06,055.026c vyākrośanta raṇe tatra vīrā bahuvidhaṃ bahu
analyzed: vyākrośanta raṇe tatra vīrāḥ bahuvidham bahu
amānuṣeṇa rūpeṇa carantam pitaram tava
śalabhāḥ iva rājānaḥ patanti vidhi coditāḥ
bhīṣma agnim abhi saṃkruddham vināśāya sahasraśas

original: 06,055.028a na hi moghaḥ śaraḥ kaś cid āsīd bhīṣmasya saṃyuge
analyzed: na hi moghaḥ śaraḥ kaḥ cit āsīt bhīṣmasya saṃyuge
nara nāga aśva kāyeṣu bahu tvāt laghu vedhinaḥ
bhinatti ekena bāṇena su muktena patatriṇā
gaja kaṅkaṭa saṃnāham vajreṇa iva acala uttamam

original: 06,055.030a dvau trīn api gajārohān piṇḍitān varmitān api
analyzed: dvau trīn api gaja ārohān piṇḍitān varmitān api
nārācena su tīkṣṇena nijaghāna pitā tava

original: 06,055.031a yo yo bhīṣmaṃ naravyāghram abhyeti yudhi kaś cana
analyzed: yaḥ yaḥ bhīṣmam nara vyāghram abhyeti yudhi kaḥ cana

original: 06,055.031c muhūrtadṛṣṭaḥ sa mayā pātito bhuvi dṛśyate
analyzed: muhūrta dṛṣṭaḥ sa mayā pātitaḥ bhuvi dṛśyate
evam sā dharmarājasya vadhyamānā mahā camūḥ
bhīṣmeṇa atula vīryeṇa vyaśīryata sahasradhā
prakīryata mahā senā śara varṣa abhitāpitā
paśyataḥ vāsudevasya pārthasya ca mahātmanaḥ
yatamānā api te vīrāḥ dravamāṇān mahā rathān
na aśaknuvan vārayitum bhīṣma bāṇa prapīḍitāḥ
mahā indra sama vīryeṇa vadhyamānā mahā camūḥ

original: 06,055.035c abhajyata mahārāja na ca dvau saha dhāvataḥ
analyzed: abhajyata mahā rāja na ca dvau saha dhāvataḥ
āviddha nara nāga aśvam patita dhvaja kūbaram
anīkam pāṇḍu putrāṇām hāhā bhūtam acetanam

original: 06,055.037a jaghānātra pitā putraṃ putraś ca pitaraṃ tathā
analyzed: jaghāna atra pitā putram putraḥ ca pitaram tathā
priyam sakhāyam ca ākrande sakhā daiva balātkṛtaḥ
vimucya kavacān anye pāṇḍu putrasya sainikāḥ
prakīrya keśān dhāvantaḥ pratyadṛśyanta bhārata
tat gokulam iva udbhrāntam udbhrānta ratha yūthapam
dadṛśe pāṇḍu putrasya sainyam ārta svaram tadā
prabhajyamānam tat sainyam dṛṣṭvā devakī nandanaḥ

original: 06,055.040c uvāca pārthaṃ bībhatsuṃ nigṛhya ratham uttamam
analyzed: uvāca pārtham bībhatsum nigṛhya ratham uttamam

original: 06,055.041a ayaṃ sa kālaḥ saṃprāptaḥ pārtha yaḥ kāṅkṣitas tvayā
analyzed: ayam sa kālaḥ saṃprāptaḥ pārtha yaḥ kāṅkṣitaḥ tvayā

original: 06,055.041c praharāsmai naravyāghra na cen mohād vimuhyase
analyzed: prahara asmai nara vyāghra na ced mohāt vimuhyase

original: 06,055.042a yat tvayā kathitaṃ vīra purā rājñāṃ samāgame
analyzed: yat tvayā kathitam vīra purā rājñām samāgame
bhīṣma droṇa mukhān sarvān dhārtarāṣṭrasya sainikān

original: 06,055.043a sānubandhān haniṣyāmi ye māṃ yotsyanti saṃyuge
analyzed: sa anubandhān haniṣyāmi ye mām yotsyanti saṃyuge

original: 06,055.043c iti tat kuru kaunteya satyaṃ vākyam ariṃdama
analyzed: iti tat kuru kaunteya satyam vākyam ariṃdama

original: 06,055.044a bībhatso paśya sainyaṃ svaṃ bhajyamānaṃ samantataḥ
analyzed: bībhatso paśya sainyam svam bhajyamānam samantataḥ

original: 06,055.044c dravataś ca mahīpālān sarvān yaudhiṣṭhire bale
analyzed: dravataḥ ca mahīpālān sarvān yaudhiṣṭhire bale

original: 06,055.045a dṛṣṭvā hi samare bhīṣmaṃ vyāttānanam ivāntakam
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā hi samare bhīṣmam vyātta ānanam iva antakam
bhaya ārtāḥ saṃpraṇaśyanti siṃham kṣudra mṛgāḥ iva
evam uktaḥ pratyuvāca vāsudevam dhanaṃjayaḥ
codaya aśvān yatas bhīṣmaḥ vigāhya etat bala arṇavam
pātayiṣyāmi durdharṣam kuruvṛddham pitāmaham
śvān rajata prakhyān codayām āsa mādhavaḥ

original: 06,055.047c yato bhīṣmaratho rājan duṣprekṣyo raśmimān iva
analyzed: yatas bhīṣma rathaḥ rājan duṣprekṣyaḥ raśmimān iva

original: 06,055.048a tatas tat punar āvṛttaṃ yudhiṣṭhirabalaṃ mahat
analyzed: tatas tat punar āvṛttam yudhiṣṭhira balam mahat
dṛṣṭvā pārtham mahā bāhum bhīṣmāya udyantam āhave

original: 06,055.049a tato bhīṣmaḥ kuruśreṣṭhaḥ siṃhavad vinadan muhuḥ
analyzed: tatas bhīṣmaḥ kuru śreṣṭhaḥ siṃha vat vinadan muhur
dhanaṃjaya ratham tūrṇam śara varṣaiḥ avākirat

original: 06,055.050a kṣaṇena sa rathas tasya sahayaḥ sahasārathiḥ
analyzed: kṣaṇena sa rathaḥ tasya sa hayaḥ saha sārathiḥ
śara varṣeṇa mahatā saṃchannaḥ na prakāśate

original: 06,055.051a vāsudevas tv asaṃbhrānto dhairyam āsthāya sattvavān
analyzed: vāsudevaḥ tu asaṃbhrāntaḥ dhairyam āsthāya sattvavān

original: 06,055.051c codayām āsa tān aśvān vitunnān bhīṣmasāyakaiḥ
analyzed: codayām āsa tān aśvān vitunnān bhīṣma sāyakaiḥ

original: 06,055.052a tataḥ pārtho dhanur gṛhya divyaṃ jaladanisvanam
analyzed: tatas pārthaḥ dhanuḥ gṛhya divyam jalada nisvanam

original: 06,055.052c pātayām āsa bhīṣmasya dhanuś chittvā tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: pātayām āsa bhīṣmasya dhanuḥ chittvā tribhiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 06,055.053a sa cchinnadhanvā kauravyaḥ punar anyan mahad dhanuḥ
analyzed: sa chinna dhanvā kauravyaḥ punar anyat mahat dhanuḥ
nimeṣa antara mātreṇa sajyam cakre pitā tava
vicakarṣa tatas dorbhyām dhanuḥ jalada nisvanam

original: 06,055.054c athāsya tad api kruddhaś ciccheda dhanur arjunaḥ
analyzed: atha asya tat api kruddhaḥ ciccheda dhanuḥ arjunaḥ

original: 06,055.055a tasya tat pūjayām āsa lāghavaṃ śaṃtanoḥ sutaḥ
analyzed: tasya tat pūjayām āsa lāghavam śaṃtanoḥ sutaḥ

original: 06,055.055c sādhu pārtha mahābāho sādhu bho pāṇḍunandana
analyzed: sādhu pārtha mahā bāho sādhu bho pāṇḍu nandana

original: 06,055.056a tvayy evaitad yuktarūpaṃ mahat karma dhanaṃjaya
analyzed: tvayi eva etat yukta rūpam mahat karma dhanaṃjaya

original: 06,055.056c prīto 'smi sudṛḍhaṃ putra kuru yuddhaṃ mayā saha
analyzed: prītaḥ smi su dṛḍham putra kuru yuddham mayā saha

original: 06,055.057a iti pārthaṃ praśasyātha pragṛhyānyan mahad dhanuḥ
analyzed: iti pārtham praśasya atha pragṛhya anyat mahat dhanuḥ

original: 06,055.057c mumoca samare vīraḥ śarān pārtharathaṃ prati
analyzed: mumoca samare vīraḥ śarān pārtha ratham prati
adarśayat vāsudevaḥ haya yāne param balam

original: 06,055.058c moghān kurvañ śarāṃs tasya maṇḍalāny acaral laghu
analyzed: moghān kurvam śarān tasya maṇḍalāni acarat laghu
tathā api bhīṣmaḥ su dṛḍham vāsudeva dhanaṃjayau
vivyādha niśitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ sarva gātreṣu māriṣa
śuśubhāte nara vyāghrau tau bhīṣma śara vikṣatau
go vṛṣau iva nardantau viṣāṇa ullikhita aṅkitau
punar ca api su saṃkruddhaḥ śaraiḥ saṃnata parvabhiḥ

original: 06,055.061c kṛṣṇayor yudhi saṃrabdho bhīṣmo vyāvārayad diśaḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇayoḥ yudhi saṃrabdhaḥ bhīṣmaḥ vyāvārayat diśaḥ
pārthaḥ pi samare kruddhaḥ bhīṣmasya avārayat diśaḥ
bhīṣmaḥ pi rathinām śreṣṭhaḥ pārthasya avārayat diśaḥ

original: 06,055.062a vārṣṇeyaṃ ca śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ kampayām āsa roṣitaḥ
analyzed: vārṣṇeyam ca śaraiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ kampayām āsa roṣitaḥ

original: 06,055.062c muhur abhyutsmayan bhīṣmaḥ prahasya svanavat tadā
analyzed: muhur abhyutsmayan bhīṣmaḥ prahasya svanavat tadā

original: 06,055.063a tataḥ kṛṣṇas tu samare dṛṣṭvā bhīṣmaparākramam
analyzed: tatas kṛṣṇaḥ tu samare dṛṣṭvā bhīṣma parākramam
saṃprekṣya ca mahā bāhuḥ pārthasya mṛdu yuddha tām

original: 06,055.064a bhīṣmaṃ ca śaravarṣāṇi sṛjantam aniśaṃ yudhi
analyzed: bhīṣmam ca śara varṣāṇi sṛjantam aniśam yudhi
pratapantam iva ādityam madhyam āsādya senayoḥ
varān varān vinighnantam pāṇḍu putrasya sainikān

original: 06,055.065c yugāntam iva kurvāṇaṃ bhīṣmaṃ yaudhiṣṭhire bale
analyzed: yuga antam iva kurvāṇam bhīṣmam yaudhiṣṭhire bale
amṛṣyamāṇaḥ bhagavān keśavaḥ para vīra hā
acintayat ameya ātmā na asti yaudhiṣṭhiram balam

original: 06,055.067a ekāhnā hi raṇe bhīṣmo nāśayed devadānavān
analyzed: eka ahnā hi raṇe bhīṣmaḥ nāśayet deva dānavān

original: 06,055.067c kim u pāṇḍusutān yuddhe sabalān sapadānugān
analyzed: kim u pāṇḍu sutān yuddhe sa balān sa padānugān

original: 06,055.068a dravate ca mahat sainyaṃ pāṇḍavasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: dravate ca mahat sainyam pāṇḍavasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 06,055.068c ete ca kauravās tūrṇaṃ prabhagnān dṛśya somakān
analyzed: ete ca kauravāḥ tūrṇam prabhagnān dṛśya somakān
ādravanti raṇe hṛṣṭāḥ harṣayantaḥ pitāmaham

original: 06,055.069a so 'haṃ bhīṣmaṃ nihanmy adya pāṇḍavārthāya daṃśitaḥ
analyzed: saḥ ham bhīṣmam nihanmi adya pāṇḍava arthāya daṃśitaḥ
bhāram etam vineṣyāmi pāṇḍavānām mahātmanām

original: 06,055.070a arjuno 'pi śarais tīkṣṇair vadhyamāno hi saṃyuge
analyzed: arjunaḥ pi śaraiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ vadhyamānaḥ hi saṃyuge
kartavyam na abhijānāti raṇe bhīṣmasya gauravāt

original: 06,055.071a tathā cintayatas tasya bhūya eva pitāmahaḥ
analyzed: tathā cintayataḥ tasya bhūyas eva pitāmahaḥ

original: 06,055.071c preṣayām āsa saṃkruddhaḥ śarān pārtharathaṃ prati
analyzed: preṣayām āsa saṃkruddhaḥ śarān pārtha ratham prati
teṣām bahu tvāt hi bhṛśam śarāṇām
diśaḥ tha sarvāḥ pihitāḥ babhūvuḥ

original: 06,055.072c na cāntarikṣaṃ na diśo na bhūmir;
analyzed: na ca antarikṣam na diśaḥ na bhūmiḥ
na bhāskaraḥ dṛśyata raśmi mālī
vavuḥ ca vātāḥ tumulāḥ sa dhūmā
diśaḥ ca sarvāḥ kṣubhitāḥ babhūvuḥ
droṇaḥ vikarṇaḥ tha jayadrathaḥ ca
bhūriśravāḥ kṛtavarmā kṛpaḥ ca
śrutāyuḥ ambaṣṭha patiḥ ca rājā
vinda anuvindau ca sudakṣiṇaḥ ca
prācyāḥ ca sauvīragaṇāḥ ca sarve
vasātayaḥ kṣudraka mālavāḥ ca
kirīṭinam tvaramāṇā abhisasruḥ
nideśa gāḥ śāṃtanavasya rājñaḥ
tava api putrasya tu kopanasya
tam vāji pādāta ratha ogha jālaiḥ
aneka sāhasra śataiḥ dadarśa
kirīṭinam saṃparivāryamāṇam
śineḥ naptā vāraṇa yūthapaiḥ ca
tatas tu dṛṣṭvā arjuna vāsudevau
padāti nāga aśva rathaiḥ samantāt
abhidrutau śastrabhṛtām variṣṭhau
śini pravīraḥ bhisasāra tūrṇam
sa tāni anīkāni mahā dhanuṣmān
śinipravīraḥ sahasā abhipatya
cakāra sāhāyyam atha arjunasya
viṣṇuḥ yathā vṛtra niṣūdanasya
viśīrṇa nāga aśva ratha dhvaja ogham
bhīṣmeṇa vitrāsita sarva yodham
yudhiṣṭhira anīkam abhidravantam
provāca saṃdṛśya śini pravīraḥ
kva kṣatriyāḥ yāsyatha na eṣa dharmaḥ
satām purastāt kathitaḥ purāṇaiḥ
mā svām pratijñām jahata pravīrāḥ
svam vīra dharmam paripālayadhvam
tān vāsavān antarajaḥ niśamya
narendra mukhyān dravataḥ samantāt
pārthasya dṛṣṭvā mṛdu yuddha tām ca
bhīṣmam ca saṃkhye samudīryamāṇam
amṛṣyamāṇaḥ sa tatas mahātmā
yaśasvinam sarva daśārha bhartā
uvāca śaineyam abhipraśaṃsan
dṛṣṭvā kurūn āpatataḥ samantāt
ye yānti yāntu eva śinipravīra
ye pi sthitāḥ sātvata te pi yāntu
bhīṣmam rathāt paśya nipātyamānam
droṇam ca saṃkhye sa gaṇam mayā adya
na asau rathaḥ sātvata kauravāṇām
kruddhasya mucyeta raṇe kaḥ cit
tasmāt aham gṛhya rathāṅgam ugram
prāṇam hariṣyāmi mahāvratasya
nihatya bhīṣmam sa gaṇam tathā ājau
droṇam ca śaineya ratha pravīram
prītim kariṣyāmi dhanaṃjayasya
rājñaḥ ca bhīmasya tathā aśvinoḥ ca
nihatya sarvān dhṛtarāṣṭra putrān
tad pakṣiṇaḥ ye ca narendra mukhyāḥ
rājyena rājānam ajātaśatrum
saṃpādayiṣyāmi aham adya hṛṣṭaḥ
iti idam uktvā sa mahā anubhāvaḥ
sasmāra cakram niśitam purāṇam
sudarśanam cintita mātram eva
tasya agra hastam svayam āruroha
tatas sunābham vasudeva putraḥ
sūrya prabham vajra sama prabhāvam
kṣura antam udyamya bhujena cakram
rathāt avaplutya visṛjya vāhān
saṃkampayan gām caraṇaiḥ mahātmā
vegena kṛṣṇaḥ prasasāra bhīṣmam
mada andham ājau samudīrṇa darpaḥ
siṃhaḥ jighāṃsan iva vāraṇa indram
saḥ bhyadravat bhīṣmam anīka madhye
kruddhaḥ mahendra avarajaḥ pramāthī
vyālambi pīta anta paṭaḥ cakāśe
ghanaḥ yathā khe cira bhā pinaddhaḥ
sudarśanam ca asya rarāja śaureḥ
tat cakra padmam su bhuja ūru nālam
yathā ādi padmam taruṇa arka varṇam
rarāja nārāyaṇa nābhi jātam
tat kṛṣṇa kopa udaya sūrya buddham
kṣura anta tīkṣṇa agra sujāta patram
tasya eva deha uru saraḥ prarūḍham
rarāja nārāyaṇa bāhunā alam
tam ātta cakram praṇadantam uccais
kruddham mahā indra avarajam samīkṣya
sarvāṇi bhūtāni bhṛśam vineduḥ
kṣayam kurūṇām iti cintayitvā
sa vāsudevaḥ pragṛhīta cakraḥ
saṃvartayiṣyan iva jīva lokam
abhyutpatan lokaguruḥ babhāse
bhūtāni dhakṣyan iva kāla vahniḥ
tam āpatantam pragṛhīta cakram
samīkṣya devam dvipadām variṣṭham
asaṃbhramāt kārmuka bāṇa pāṇī
rathe sthitaḥ śāṃtanavaḥ bhyuvāca
asaṃbhramam tat vicakarṣa dorbhyām
mahā dhanuḥ gāṇḍiva tulya ghoṣam
uvāca bhīṣmaḥ tam ananta pauruṣam
govindam ājau a vimūḍha cetāḥ
ehi ehi deveśa jagannivāsa
namaḥ stu te śārṅga ratha aṅga pāṇe
prasahya mām pātaya lokanātha
ratha uttamāt bhūtaśaraṇya saṃkhye
mama ugra cakreṇa nikṛnta deham
tvayā hatasya iha mama adya kṛṣṇa
śreyaḥ parasmin iha ca eva loke
saṃbhāvitaḥ smi andhaka vṛṣṇinā atha
lokaiḥ tribhiḥ vīra tava abhiyānāt
śrutvā vacaḥ śāṃtanavasya kṛṣṇo
vegena dhāvan tam atha abhyuvāca
tvam mūlam asya iha bhuvi kṣayasya
duryodhanam ca adya samuddhariṣyasi
durdyūta devī nṛpatiḥ nivāryaḥ
su mantriṇā dharma pathi sthitena
vā kāla parīta buddhiḥ
dharma atigaḥ yaḥ kula pāṃsanaḥ syāt

vinda anuvindau āvantyau irāvantam abhidrutau

original: 06,077.026a sarve nṛpās tu samare dhanaṃjayam ayodhayan
analyzed: sarve nṛpāḥ tu samare dhanaṃjayam ayodhayan
bhīmasenaḥ raṇe yattaḥ hārdikyam samavārayat

original: 06,077.027a citrasenaṃ vikarṇaṃ ca tathā durmarṣaṇaṃ vibho
analyzed: citrasenam vikarṇam ca tathā durmarṣaṇam vibho

original: 06,077.027c ārjuniḥ samare rājaṃs tava putrān ayodhayat
analyzed: ārjuniḥ samare rājan tava putrān ayodhayat
prāgjyotiṣam mahā iṣvāsam haiḍimbaḥ rākṣasa uttamaḥ

original: 06,077.028c abhidudrāva vegena matto mattam iva dvipam
analyzed: abhidudrāva vegena mattaḥ mattam iva dvipam
alambuṣaḥ tatas rājan sātyakim yuddha durmadam
sa sainyam samare kruddhaḥ rākṣasaḥ samabhidravat
bhūriśravāḥ raṇe yattaḥ dhṛṣṭaketum ayodhayat
śrutāyuṣam tu rājānam dharmaputraḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
cekitānaḥ tu samare kṛpam eva anvayodhayat

original: 06,077.031c śeṣāḥ pratiyayur yattā bhīmam eva mahāratham
analyzed: śeṣāḥ pratiyayuḥ yattāḥ bhīmam eva mahā ratham
tatas rāja sahasrāṇi parivavruḥ dhanaṃjayam
śakti tomara nārāca gadā parigha pāṇayaḥ

original: 06,077.033a arjuno 'tha bhṛśaṃ kruddho vārṣṇeyam idam abravīt
analyzed: arjunaḥ bhṛśam kruddhaḥ vārṣṇeyam idam abravīt
paśya mādhava sainyāni dhārtarāṣṭrasya saṃyuge
vyūḍhāni vyūha viduṣā gāṅgeyena mahātmanā

original: 06,077.034a yuddhābhikāmāñ śūrāṃś ca paśya mādhava daṃśitān
analyzed: yuddha abhikāmām śūrān ca paśya mādhava daṃśitān
trigarta rājam sahitam bhrātṛbhiḥ paśya keśava
adya etān pātayiṣyāmi paśyataḥ te janārdana

original: 06,077.035c ya ime māṃ yaduśreṣṭha yoddhukāmā raṇājire
analyzed: ye ime mām yadu śreṣṭha yoddhu kāmāḥ raṇa ajire

original: 06,077.036a evam uktvā tu kaunteyo dhanurjyām avamṛjya ca
analyzed: evam uktvā tu kaunteyaḥ dhanuḥ jyām avamṛjya ca
vavarṣa śara varṣāṇi narādhipa gaṇān prati
te pi tam parama iṣvāsāḥ śara varṣaiḥ apūrayan

original: 06,077.037c taḍāgam iva dhārābhir yathā prāvṛṣi toyadā
analyzed: taḍāgam iva dhārābhiḥ yathā prāvṛṣi toyadā

original: 06,077.038a hāhākāro mahān āsīt tava sainye viśāṃ pate
analyzed: hāhākāraḥ mahān āsīt tava sainye viśām pate

original: 06,077.038c chādyamānau bhṛśaṃ kṛṣṇau śarair dṛṣṭvā mahāraṇe
analyzed: chādyamānau bhṛśam kṛṣṇau śaraiḥ dṛṣṭvā mahā raṇe

original: 06,077.039a devā devarṣayaś caiva gandharvāś ca mahoragāḥ
analyzed: devāḥ devarṣayaḥ ca eva gandharvāḥ ca mahā uragāḥ

original: 06,077.039c vismayaṃ paramaṃ jagmur dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇau tathāgatau
analyzed: vismayam paramam jagmuḥ dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇau tathāgatau

original: 06,077.040a tataḥ kruddho 'rjuno rājann aindram astram udīrayat
analyzed: tatas kruddhaḥ rjunaḥ rājan aindram astram udīrayat
tatra adbhutam apaśyāma vijayasya parākramam

original: 06,077.041a śastravṛṣṭiṃ parair muktāṃ śaraughair yad avārayat
analyzed: śastra vṛṣṭim paraiḥ muktām śara oghaiḥ yat avārayat

original: 06,077.041c na ca tatrāpy anirbhinnaḥ kaś cid āsīd viśāṃ pate
analyzed: na ca tatra api a nirbhinnaḥ kaḥ cit āsīt viśām pate
teṣām rāja sahasrāṇām hayānām dantinām tathā

original: 06,077.042c dvābhyāṃ tribhiḥ śaraiś cānyān pārtho vivyādha māriṣa
analyzed: dvābhyām tribhiḥ śaraiḥ ca anyān pārthaḥ vivyādha māriṣa

original: 06,077.043a te hanyamānāḥ pārthena bhīṣmaṃ śāṃtanavaṃ yayuḥ
analyzed: te hanyamānāḥ pārthena bhīṣmam śāṃtanavam yayuḥ
agādhe majjamānānām bhīṣmaḥ trātā abhavat tadā

original: 06,077.044a āpatadbhis tu tais tatra prabhagnaṃ tāvakaṃ balam
analyzed: āpatadbhiḥ tu taiḥ tatra prabhagnam tāvakam balam
saṃcukṣubhe mahā rāja vātaiḥ iva mahā arṇavaḥ
saṃjayaḥ uvāca

original: 06,078.001a tathā pravṛtte saṃgrāme nivṛtte ca suśarmaṇi
analyzed: tathā pravṛtte saṃgrāme nivṛtte ca suśarmaṇi
prabhagneṣu ca vīreṣu pāṇḍavena mahātmanā
kṣubhyamāṇe bale tūrṇam sāgara pratime tava

original: 06,078.002c pratyudyāte ca gāṅgeye tvaritaṃ vijayaṃ prati
analyzed: pratyudyāte ca gāṅgeye tvaritam vijayam prati

original: 06,078.003a dṛṣṭvā duryodhano rājan raṇe pārthasya vikramam
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā duryodhanaḥ rājan raṇe pārthasya vikramam

original: 06,078.003c tvaramāṇaḥ samabhyetya sarvāṃs tān abravīn nṛpān
analyzed: tvaramāṇaḥ samabhyetya sarvān tān abravīt nṛpān

original: 06,078.004a teṣāṃ ca pramukhe śūraṃ suśarmāṇaṃ mahābalam
analyzed: teṣām ca pramukhe śūram suśarmāṇam mahā balam

original: 06,078.004c madhye sarvasya sainyasya bhṛśaṃ saṃharṣayan vacaḥ
analyzed: madhye sarvasya sainyasya bhṛśam saṃharṣayan vacaḥ
eṣa bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavaḥ yoddhu kāmaḥ dhanaṃjayam
sarva ātmanā kuru śreṣṭhaḥ tyaktvā jīvitam ātmanaḥ
tam prayāntam para anīkam sarva sainyena bhāratam
saṃyattāḥ samare sarve pālayadhvam pitāmaham

original: 06,078.007a bāḍham ity evam uktvā tu tāny anīkāni sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: bāḍham iti evam uktvā tu tāni anīkāni sarvaśas
narendrāṇām mahā rāja samājagmuḥ pitāmaham
tatas prayātaḥ sahasā bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavaḥ rjunam
raṇe bhāratam āyāntam āsasāda mahā balam
mahā śveta aśva yuktena bhīma vānara ketunā
mahatā megha nādena rathena ati virājata
samare sarva sainyānām upayātam dhanaṃjayam

original: 06,078.010c abhavat tumulo nādo bhayād dṛṣṭvā kirīṭinam
analyzed: abhavat tumulaḥ nādaḥ bhayāt dṛṣṭvā kirīṭinam
abhīśu hastam kṛṣṇam ca dṛṣṭvā ādityam iva aparam
madhyaṃdina gatam saṃkhye na śekuḥ prativīkṣitum
tathā śāṃtanavam bhīṣmam śveta aśvam śveta kārmukam

original: 06,078.012c na śekuḥ pāṇḍavā draṣṭuṃ śvetagraham ivoditam
analyzed: na śekuḥ pāṇḍavāḥ draṣṭum śveta graham iva uditam
sa sarvatas parivṛtaḥ trigartaiḥ su mahātmabhiḥ

original: 06,078.013c bhrātṛbhis tava putraiś ca tathānyaiś ca mahārathaiḥ
analyzed: bhrātṛbhiḥ tava putraiḥ ca tathā anyaiḥ ca mahā rathaiḥ

original: 06,078.014a bhāradvājas tu samare matsyaṃ vivyādha patriṇā
analyzed: bhāradvājaḥ tu samare matsyam vivyādha patriṇā

original: 06,078.014c dhvajaṃ cāsya śareṇājau dhanuś caikena cicchide
analyzed: dhvajam ca asya śareṇa ājau dhanuḥ ca ekena cicchide

original: 06,078.015a tad apāsya dhanuś chinnaṃ virāṭo vāhinīpatiḥ
analyzed: tat apāsya dhanuḥ chinnam virāṭaḥ vāhinīpatiḥ

original: 06,078.015c anyad ādatta vegena dhanur bhārasahaṃ dṛḍham
analyzed: anyat ādatta vegena dhanuḥ bhāra saham dṛḍham
śarān ca āśīviṣa ākārām jvalitān pannagān iva

original: 06,078.016a droṇaṃ tribhiḥ pravivyādha caturbhiś cāsya vājinaḥ
analyzed: droṇam tribhiḥ pravivyādha caturbhiḥ ca asya vājinaḥ

original: 06,078.016c dhvajam ekena vivyādha sārathiṃ cāsya pañcabhiḥ
analyzed: dhvajam ekena vivyādha sārathim ca asya pañcabhiḥ
dhanuḥ eka iṣuṇā avidhyat tatra akrudhyat dvijarṣabhaḥ
tasya droṇaḥ vadhīt aśvām śaraiḥ saṃnata parvabhiḥ
aṣṭābhiḥ bharata śreṣṭha sūtam ekena patriṇā
sa hata aśvāt avaplutya syandanāt hata sārathiḥ

original: 06,078.018c āruroha rathaṃ tūrṇaṃ śaṅkhasya rathināṃ varaḥ
analyzed: āruroha ratham tūrṇam śaṅkhasya rathinām varaḥ

original: 06,078.019a tatas tu tau pitāputrau bhāradvājaṃ rathe sthitau
analyzed: tatas tu tau pitāputrau bhāradvājam rathe sthitau
mahatā śara varṣeṇa vārayām āsatuḥ balāt
bhāradvājaḥ tatas kruddhaḥ śaram āśīviṣa upamam

original: 06,078.020c cikṣepa samare tūrṇaṃ śaṅkhaṃ prati janeśvara
analyzed: cikṣepa samare tūrṇam śaṅkham prati janeśvara

original: 06,078.021a sa tasya hṛdayaṃ bhittvā pītvā śoṇitam āhave
analyzed: sa tasya hṛdayam bhittvā pītvā śoṇitam āhave
jagāma dharaṇim bāṇaḥ lohita ārdrīkṛta chaviḥ
sa papāta rathāt tūrṇam bhāradvāja śara āhataḥ

original: 06,078.022c dhanus tyaktvā śarāṃś caiva pitur eva samīpataḥ
analyzed: dhanuḥ tyaktvā śarān ca eva pituḥ eva samīpatas

original: 06,078.023a hataṃ svam ātmajaṃ dṛṣṭvā virāṭaḥ prādravad bhayāt
analyzed: hatam svam ātmajam dṛṣṭvā virāṭaḥ prādravat bhayāt
utsṛjya samare droṇam vyātta ānanam iva antakam
bhāradvājaḥ tatas tūrṇam pāṇḍavānām mahā camūm
dārayām āsa samare sahasraśas

original: 06,078.025a śikhaṇḍy api mahārāja drauṇim āsādya saṃyuge
analyzed: śikhaṇḍī api mahā rāja drauṇim āsādya saṃyuge

original: 06,078.025c ājaghāna bhruvor madhye nārācais tribhir āśugaiḥ
analyzed: ājaghāna bhruvoḥ madhye nārācaiḥ tribhiḥ āśugaiḥ

original: 06,078.026a sa babhau naraśārdūlo lalāṭe saṃsthitais tribhiḥ
analyzed: sa babhau nara śārdūlaḥ lalāṭe saṃsthitaiḥ tribhiḥ
śikharaiḥ kāñcana mayaiḥ meruḥ tribhiḥ iva ucchritaiḥ
aśvatthāmā tatas kruddhaḥ nimeṣa ardhāt śikhaṇḍinaḥ

original: 06,078.027c sūtaṃ dhvajam atho rājaṃs turagān āyudhaṃ tathā
analyzed: sūtam dhvajam atho rājan turagān āyudham tathā

original: 06,078.027e śarair bahubhir uddiśya pātayām āsa saṃyuge
analyzed: śaraiḥ bahubhiḥ uddiśya pātayām āsa saṃyuge

original: 06,078.028a sa hatāśvād avaplutya rathād vai rathināṃ varaḥ
analyzed: sa hata aśvāt avaplutya rathāt vai rathinām varaḥ

original: 06,078.028c khaḍgam ādāya niśitaṃ vimalaṃ ca śarāvaram
analyzed: khaḍgam ādāya niśitam vimalam ca śarāvaram
śyena vat vyacarat kruddhaḥ śikhaṇḍī śatru tāpanaḥ
sa khaḍgasya mahā rāja carataḥ tasya saṃyuge

original: 06,078.029c nāntaraṃ dadṛśe drauṇis tad adbhutam ivābhavat
analyzed: na antaram dadṛśe drauṇiḥ tat adbhutam iva abhavat
tatas śara sahasrāṇi bahūni bharata ṛṣabha
preṣayām āsa samare drauṇiḥ parama kopanaḥ
tām āpatantīm samare śara vṛṣṭim su dāruṇām
asinā tīkṣṇa dhāreṇa ciccheda balinām varaḥ
tatas sya vimalam drauṇiḥ śata candram manoramam

original: 06,078.032c carmācchinad asiṃ cāsya khaṇḍayām āsa saṃyuge
analyzed: carma ācchinat asim ca asya khaṇḍayām āsa saṃyuge

original: 06,078.032e śitaiḥ subahuśo rājaṃs taṃ ca vivyādha patribhiḥ
analyzed: śitaiḥ su bahuśas rājan tam ca vivyādha patribhiḥ

original: 06,078.033a śikhaṇḍī tu tataḥ khaḍgaṃ khaṇḍitaṃ tena sāyakaiḥ
analyzed: śikhaṇḍī tu tatas khaḍgam khaṇḍitam tena sāyakaiḥ

original: 06,078.033c āvidhya vyasṛjat tūrṇaṃ jvalantam iva pannagam
analyzed: āvidhya vyasṛjat tūrṇam jvalantam iva pannagam
tam āpatantam sahasā kāla anala sama prabham
ciccheda samare drauṇiḥ darśayan pāṇi lāghavam

original: 06,078.034e śikhaṇḍinaṃ ca vivyādha śarair bahubhir āyasaiḥ
analyzed: śikhaṇḍinam ca vivyādha śaraiḥ bahubhiḥ āyasaiḥ

original: 06,078.035a śikhaṇḍī tu bhṛśaṃ rājaṃs tāḍyamānaḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: śikhaṇḍī tu bhṛśam rājan tāḍyamānaḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
āruroha ratham tūrṇam mādhavasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 06,078.036a sātyakis tu tataḥ kruddho rākṣasaṃ krūram āhave
analyzed: sātyakiḥ tu tatas kruddhaḥ rākṣasam krūram āhave

original: 06,078.036c alambusaṃ śarair ghorair vivyādha balinaṃ balī
analyzed: alambuṣam śaraiḥ ghoraiḥ vivyādha balinam balī

original: 06,078.037a rākṣasendras tatas tasya dhanuś ciccheda bhārata
analyzed: rākṣasa indraḥ tatas tasya dhanuḥ ciccheda bhārata

original: 06,078.037c ardhacandreṇa samare taṃ ca vivyādha sāyakaiḥ
analyzed: ardhacandreṇa samare tam ca vivyādha sāyakaiḥ

original: 06,078.037e māyāṃ ca rākṣasīṃ kṛtvā śaravarṣair avākirat
analyzed: māyām ca rākṣasīm kṛtvā śara varṣaiḥ avākirat
athā anyat dhanuḥ ādāya bhāra sādhanam uttamam
tatra adbhutam apaśyāma śaineyasya parākramam

original: 06,078.038c nāsaṃbhramad yat samare vadhyamānaḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: na asaṃbhramat yat samare vadhyamānaḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 06,078.039a aindram astraṃ ca vārṣṇeyo yojayām āsa bhārata
analyzed: aindram astram ca vārṣṇeyaḥ yojayām āsa bhārata
vijayāt yat anuprāptam mādhavena yaśasvinā

original: 06,078.040a tad astraṃ bhasmasāt kṛtvā māyāṃ tāṃ rākṣasīṃ tadā
analyzed: tat astram bhasmasāt kṛtvā māyām tām rākṣasīm tadā
alambuṣam śaraiḥ ghoraiḥ abhyākirata sarvaśas
parvatam vāri dhārābhiḥ prāvṛṣi iva balāhakaḥ

original: 06,078.041a tat tathā pīḍitaṃ tena mādhavena mahātmanā
analyzed: tat tathā pīḍitam tena mādhavena mahātmanā

original: 06,078.041c pradudrāva bhayād rakṣo hitvā sātyakim āhave
analyzed: pradudrāva bhayāt rakṣaḥ hitvā sātyakim āhave

original: 06,078.042a tam ajeyaṃ rākṣasendraṃ saṃkhye maghavatā api
analyzed: tam ajeyam rākṣasa indram saṃkhye maghavatā api

original: 06,078.042c śaineyaḥ prāṇadaj jitvā yodhānāṃ tava paśyatām
analyzed: śaineyaḥ prāṇadat jitvā yodhānām tava paśyatām
nyahanat tāvakān ca api sātyakiḥ satya vikramaḥ
niśitaiḥ bahubhiḥ bāṇaiḥ te dravanta bhaya arditāḥ

original: 06,078.044a etasminn eva kāle tu drupadasyātmajo balī
analyzed: etasmin eva kāle tu drupadasya ātmajaḥ balī
dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ mahā rāja tava putram janeśvaram
chādayām āsa samare śaraiḥ saṃnata parvabhiḥ
saṃchādyamānaḥ viśikhaiḥ dhṛṣṭadyumnena bhārata

original: 06,078.045c vivyathe na ca rājendra tava putro janeśvaraḥ
analyzed: vivyathe na ca rāja indra tava putraḥ janeśvaraḥ

original: 06,078.046a dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca samare tūrṇaṃ vivyādha sāyakaiḥ
analyzed: dhṛṣṭadyumnam ca samare tūrṇam vivyādha sāyakaiḥ

original: 06,078.046c ṣaṣṭyā ca triṃśatā caiva tad adbhutam ivābhavat
analyzed: ṣaṣṭyā ca triṃśatā ca eva tat adbhutam iva abhavat

original: 06,078.047a tasya senāpatiḥ kruddho dhanuś ciccheda māriṣa
analyzed: tasya senāpatiḥ kruddhaḥ dhanuḥ ciccheda māriṣa

original: 06,078.047c hayāṃś ca caturaḥ śīghraṃ nijaghāna mahārathaḥ
analyzed: hayān ca caturaḥ śīghram nijaghāna mahā rathaḥ

original: 06,078.047e śaraiś cainaṃ suniśitaiḥ kṣipraṃ vivyādha saptabhiḥ
analyzed: śaraiḥ ca enam su niśitaiḥ kṣipram vivyādha saptabhiḥ

original: 06,078.048a sa hatāśvān mahābāhur avaplutya rathād balī
analyzed: sa hata aśvāt mahā bāhuḥ avaplutya rathāt balī

original: 06,078.048c padātir asim udyamya prādravat pārṣataṃ prati
analyzed: padātiḥ asim udyamya prādravat pārṣatam prati
śakuniḥ tam samabhyetya rāja gṛddhī mahā balaḥ
rājānam sarva lokasya ratham āropayat svakam
tatas nṛpam parājitya pārṣataḥ para vīra hā
nyahanat tāvakam sainyam vajrapāṇiḥ iva asuram

original: 06,078.051a kṛtavarmā raṇe bhīmaṃ śarair ārchan mahāratham
analyzed: kṛtavarmā raṇe bhīmam śaraiḥ ārchat mahā ratham

original: 06,078.051c pracchādayām āsa ca taṃ mahāmegho raviṃ yathā
analyzed: pracchādayām āsa ca tam mahā meghaḥ ravim yathā
tatas prahasya samare bhīmasenaḥ paraṃtapaḥ
preṣayām āsa saṃkruddhaḥ sāyakān kṛtavarmaṇe
taiḥ tirathaḥ sātvataḥ śastra kovidaḥ

original: 06,078.053c nākampata mahārāja bhīmaṃ cārchac chitaiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: na akampata mahā rāja bhīmam ca ārchat śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
tasya aśvān caturaḥ hatvā bhīmasenaḥ mahā balaḥ

original: 06,078.054c sārathiṃ pātayām āsa dhvajaṃ ca supariṣkṛtam
analyzed: sārathim pātayām āsa dhvajam ca su pariṣkṛtam
śaraiḥ bahuvidhaiḥ ca enam ācinot para vīra hā
śakalīkṛta sarva aṅgaḥ śvāvidh vat samadṛśyata

original: 06,078.056a hatāśvāt tu rathāt tūrṇaṃ vṛṣakasya rathaṃ yayau
analyzed: hata aśvāt tu rathāt tūrṇam vṛṣakasya ratham yayau

original: 06,078.056c syālasya te mahārāja tava putrasya paśyataḥ
analyzed: syālasya te mahā rāja tava putrasya paśyataḥ
bhīmasenaḥ pi saṃkruddhaḥ tava sainyam upādravat
nijaghāna ca saṃkruddhaḥ daṇḍa pāṇiḥ iva antakaḥ

tau tu dṛṣṭvā mahā rāja bhīṣma bāṇa prapīḍitau
jagāma atha parām cintām bhīṣmasya vadha kāṅkṣayā

original: 06,082.015a tato yudhiṣṭhiro vaśyān rājñas tān samacodayat
analyzed: tatas yudhiṣṭhiraḥ vaśyān rājñaḥ tān samacodayat
bhīṣmam śāṃtanavam sarve nihata iti suhṛd gaṇān

original: 06,082.016a tatas te pārthivāḥ sarve śrutvā pārthasya bhāṣitam
analyzed: tatas te pārthivāḥ sarve śrutvā pārthasya bhāṣitam
mahatā ratha vaṃśena parivavruḥ pitāmaham

original: 06,082.017a sa samantāt parivṛtaḥ pitā devavratas tava
analyzed: sa samantāt parivṛtaḥ pitā devavrataḥ tava
cikrīda dhanuṣā rājan pātayānaḥ mahā rathān

original: 06,082.018a taṃ carantaṃ raṇe pārthā dadṛśuḥ kauravaṃ yudhi
analyzed: tam carantam raṇe pārthāḥ dadṛśuḥ kauravam yudhi
mṛga madhyam praviśya iva yathā siṃha śiśum vane

original: 06,082.019a tarjayānaṃ raṇe śūrāṃs trāsayānaṃ ca sāyakaiḥ
analyzed: tarjayānam raṇe śūrān trāsayānam ca sāyakaiḥ

original: 06,082.019c dṛṣṭvā tresur mahārāja siṃhaṃ mṛgagaṇā iva
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tresuḥ mahā rāja siṃham mṛga gaṇāḥ iva
raṇe bharata siṃhasya dadṛśuḥ kṣatriyāḥ gatim
agneḥ vāyu sahāyasya yathā kakṣam didhakṣataḥ

original: 06,082.021a śirāṃsi rathināṃ bhīṣmaḥ pātayām āsa saṃyuge
analyzed: śirāṃsi rathinām bhīṣmaḥ pātayām āsa saṃyuge

original: 06,082.021c tālebhya iva pakvāni phalāni kuśalo naraḥ
analyzed: tālebhyaḥ iva pakvāni phalāni kuśalaḥ naraḥ
patadbhiḥ ca mahā rāja śirobhiḥ dharaṇī tale

original: 06,082.022c babhūva tumulaḥ śabdaḥ patatām aśmanām iva
analyzed: babhūva tumulaḥ śabdaḥ patatām aśmanām iva

original: 06,082.023a tasmiṃs tu tumule yuddhe vartamāne sudāruṇe
analyzed: tasmin tu tumule yuddhe vartamāne su dāruṇe

original: 06,082.023c sarveṣām eva sainyānām āsīd vyatikaro mahān
analyzed: sarveṣām eva sainyānām āsīt vyatikaraḥ mahān
bhinneṣu teṣu vyūheṣu kṣatriyāḥ itaretaram
ekam ekam samāhūya yuddhāya eva upatasthire
śikhaṇḍī tu samāsādya bharatānām pitāmaham
abhidudrāva vegena tiṣṭha tiṣṭha iti ca abravīt

original: 06,082.026a anādṛtya tato bhīṣmas taṃ śikhaṇḍinam āhave
analyzed: an ādṛtya tatas bhīṣmaḥ tam śikhaṇḍinam āhave

original: 06,082.026c prayayau sṛñjayān kruddhaḥ strītvaṃ cintya śikhaṇḍinaḥ
analyzed: prayayau sṛñjayān kruddhaḥ strī tvam cintya śikhaṇḍinaḥ

original: 06,082.027a sṛñjayās tu tato hṛṣṭā dṛṣṭvā bhīṣmaṃ mahāratham
analyzed: sṛñjayāḥ tu tatas hṛṣṭāḥ dṛṣṭvā bhīṣmam mahā ratham
siṃhanādān bahuvidhān cakruḥ śaṅkha vimiśritān
tatas pravavṛte yuddham vyatiṣakta ratha dvipam

original: 06,082.028c aparāṃ diśam āsthāya sthite savitari prabho
analyzed: aparām diśam āsthāya sthite savitari prabho
dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ tha pāñcālyaḥ sātyakiḥ ca mahā rathaḥ
pīḍayantau bhṛśam sainyam śakti tomara vṛṣṭibhiḥ

original: 06,082.029e śastraiś ca bahubhī rājañ jaghnatus tāvakān raṇe
analyzed: śastraiḥ ca bahubhiḥ rājam jaghnatuḥ tāvakān raṇe
te hanyamānāḥ samare tāvakāḥ puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: 06,082.030c āryāṃ yuddhe matiṃ kṛtvā na tyajanti sma saṃyugam
analyzed: āryām yuddhe matim kṛtvā na tyajanti sma saṃyugam

original: 06,082.030e yathotsāhaṃ ca samare jaghnur lokaṃ mahārathāḥ
analyzed: yathotsāham ca samare jaghnuḥ lokam mahā rathāḥ
tatra ākrandaḥ mahān āsīt tāvakānām mahātmanām
vadhyatām samare rājan pārṣatena mahātmanā

original: 06,082.032a taṃ śrutvā ninadaṃ ghoraṃ tāvakānāṃ mahārathau
analyzed: tam śrutvā ninadam ghoram tāvakānām mahā rathau
vinda anuvindau āvantyau pārṣatam pati upasthitau

original: 06,082.033a tau tasya turagān hatvā tvaramāṇau mahārathau
analyzed: tau tasya turagān hatvā tvaramāṇau mahā rathau
chādayām āsatuḥ ubhau śara varṣeṇa pārṣatam
avaplutya atha pāñcālyaḥ rathāt tūrṇam mahā balaḥ
āruroha ratham tūrṇam sātyakeḥ su mahātmanaḥ

original: 06,082.035a tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā mahatyā senayā vṛtaḥ
analyzed: tatas yudhiṣṭhiraḥ rājā mahatyā senayā vṛtaḥ

original: 06,082.035c āvantyau samare kruddhāv abhyayāt sa paraṃtapau
analyzed: āvantyau samare kruddhau abhyayāt sa paraṃtapau
tathā eva tava sarva udyogena māriṣa
vinda anuvindau āvantyau parivārya upatasthivān
arjunaḥ ca api saṃkruddhaḥ kṣatriyān kṣatriya ṛṣabha
ayodhayata saṃgrāme vajrapāṇiḥ iva asurān

original: 06,082.038a droṇaś ca samare kruddhaḥ putrasya priyakṛt tava
analyzed: droṇaḥ ca samare kruddhaḥ putrasya priya kṛt tava
vyadhamat sarva pāñcālān tūla rāśim iva analaḥ

original: 06,082.039a duryodhanapurogās tu putrās tava viśāṃ pate
analyzed: duryodhana purogāḥ tu putrāḥ tava viśām pate

original: 06,082.039c parivārya raṇe bhīṣmaṃ yuyudhuḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
analyzed: parivārya raṇe bhīṣmam yuyudhuḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
tatas duryodhanaḥ rājā lohitāyati bhāskare

original: 06,082.040c abravīt tāvakān sarvāṃs tvaradhvam iti bhārata
analyzed: abravīt tāvakān sarvān tvaradhvam iti bhārata

original: 06,082.041a yudhyatāṃ tu tathā teṣāṃ kurvatāṃ karma duṣkaram
analyzed: yudhyatām tu tathā teṣām kurvatām karma duṣkaram
astam girim atha ārūḍhe na prakāśati bhāskare
prāvartata nadī ghorā śoṇita ogha taraṅgiṇī
gomāyu gaṇa saṃkīrṇā kṣaṇena rajanī mukhe

original: 06,082.043a śivābhir aśivābhiś ca ruvadbhir bhairavaṃ ravam
analyzed: śivābhiḥ aśivābhiḥ ca ruvadbhiḥ bhairavam ravam
ghoram āyodhanam jajñe bhūta saṃgha samākulam

original: 06,082.044a rākṣasāś ca piśācāś ca tathānye piśitāśanāḥ
analyzed: rākṣasāḥ ca piśācāḥ ca tathā anye piśita aśanāḥ
samantataḥ vyadṛśyanta sahasraśas

original: 06,082.044d*0334_01 mattā rudhiragandhena piśitena ca te nṛpāḥ
analyzed: mattāḥ rudhira gandhena piśitena ca te nṛpāḥ
āsvādya āsvādya nṛtyante nādam muñcanti bhīṣaṇam

original: 06,082.044d*0334_03 kabandhāni ca nṛtyanti dhanur hastāni saṃyuge
analyzed: kabandhāni ca nṛtyanti dhanuḥ hastāni saṃyuge

original: 06,082.044d*0334_04 prāsam ālambya niśitaṃ nistriṃśaṃ nirmalaṃ mahat
analyzed: prāsam ālambya niśitam nistriṃśam nirmalam mahat
suśarma ādīn rājñaḥ tān sa padānugān
vijitya pṛtanā madhye yayau sva śibiram prati
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ pi kauravyaḥ bhrātṛbhyām sahitaḥ tadā

original: 06,082.046c yayau svaśibiraṃ rājā niśāyāṃ senayā vṛtaḥ
analyzed: yayau sva śibiram rājā niśāyām senayā vṛtaḥ
bhīmasenaḥ u pi rāja indra duryodhana mukhān rathān

original: 06,082.047c avajitya tataḥ saṃkhye yayau svaśibiraṃ prati
analyzed: avajitya tatas saṃkhye yayau sva śibiram prati
duryodhanaḥ pi nṛpatiḥ parivārya mahā raṇe

original: 06,082.048c bhīṣmaṃ śāṃtanavaṃ tūrṇaṃ prayātaḥ śibiraṃ prati
analyzed: bhīṣmam śāṃtanavam tūrṇam prayātaḥ śibiram prati

original: 06,082.049a droṇo drauṇiḥ kṛpaḥ śalyaḥ kṛtavarmā ca sātvataḥ
analyzed: droṇaḥ drauṇiḥ kṛpaḥ śalyaḥ kṛtavarmā ca sātvataḥ

original: 06,082.049c parivārya camūṃ sarvāṃ prayayuḥ śibiraṃ prati
analyzed: parivārya camūm sarvām prayayuḥ śibiram prati

original: 06,082.050a tathaiva sātyakī rājan dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pārṣataḥ
analyzed: tathā eva sātyakiḥ rājan dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ ca pārṣataḥ

original: 06,082.050c parivārya raṇe yodhān yayatuḥ śibiraṃ prati
analyzed: parivārya raṇe yodhān yayatuḥ śibiram prati

original: 06,082.051a evam ete mahārāja tāvakāḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
analyzed: evam ete mahā rāja tāvakāḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
paryavartanta sahitāḥ niśā kāle paraṃtapāḥ

original: 06,082.052a tataḥ svaśibiraṃ gatvā pāṇḍavāḥ kuravas tathā
analyzed: tatas sva śibiram gatvā pāṇḍavāḥ kuravaḥ tathā
nyaviśanta mahā rāja pūjayantaḥ parasparam

original: 06,082.053a rakṣāṃ kṛtvātmanaḥ śūrā nyasya gulmān yathāvidhi
analyzed: rakṣām kṛtvā ātmanaḥ śūrāḥ nyasya gulmān yathāvidhi

original: 06,082.053c apanīya ca śalyāṃs te snātvā ca vividhair jalaiḥ
analyzed: apanīya ca śalyān te snātvā ca vividhaiḥ jalaiḥ
kṛta svastyayanāḥ sarve saṃstūyantaḥ ca bandibhiḥ
gīta vāditra śabdena vyakrīḍanta yaśasvinaḥ

original: 06,082.055a muhūrtam iva tat sarvam abhavat svargasaṃnibham
analyzed: muhūrtam iva tat sarvam abhavat svarga saṃnibham

original: 06,082.055c na hi yuddhakathāṃ kāṃ cit tatra cakrur mahārathāḥ
analyzed: na hi yuddha kathām kām cit tatra cakruḥ mahā rathāḥ

original: 06,082.056a te prasupte bale tatra pariśrāntajane nṛpa
analyzed: te prasupte bale tatra pariśrānta jane nṛpa
hasti aśva bahule rājan prekṣaṇīye babhūvatuḥ
saṃjayaḥ uvāca

original: 06,083.001a pariṇāmya niśāṃ tāṃ tu sukhasuptā janeśvarāḥ
analyzed: pariṇāmya niśām tām tu sukha suptāḥ janeśvarāḥ

original: 06,083.001c kuravaḥ pāṇḍavāś caiva punar yuddhāya niryayuḥ
analyzed: kuravaḥ pāṇḍavāḥ ca eva punar yuddhāya niryayuḥ

original: 06,083.002a tataḥ śabdo mahān āsīt senayor ubhayor api
analyzed: tatas śabdaḥ mahān āsīt senayoḥ ubhayoḥ api
nirgacchamānayoḥ saṃkhye sāgara pratimaḥ mahān
tatas duryodhanaḥ rājā citrasenaḥ viviṃśatiḥ

original: 06,083.003c bhīṣmaś ca rathināṃ śreṣṭho bhāradvājaś ca vai dvijaḥ
analyzed: bhīṣmaḥ ca rathinām śreṣṭhaḥ bhāradvājaḥ ca vai dvijaḥ
ekībhūtāḥ su saṃyattāḥ kauravāṇām mahā camūḥ

original: 06,083.004c vyūhāya vidadhū rājan pāṇḍavān prati daṃśitāḥ
analyzed: vyūhāya vidadhuḥ rājan pāṇḍavān prati daṃśitāḥ

original: 06,083.005a bhīṣmaḥ kṛtvā mahāvyūhaṃ pitā tava viśāṃ pate
analyzed: bhīṣmaḥ kṛtvā mahā vyūham pitā tava viśām pate
sāgara pratimam ghoram vāhana ūrmi taraṅgiṇam
agratas sarva sainyānām bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavaḥ yayau

original: 06,083.006c mālavair dākṣiṇātyaiś ca āvantyaiś ca samanvitaḥ
analyzed: mālavaiḥ dākṣiṇātyaiḥ ca āvantyaiḥ ca samanvitaḥ
tatas nantaram evā āsīt bhāradvājaḥ pratāpavān
pulindaiḥ pāradaiḥ ca eva tathā kṣudraka mālavaiḥ
droṇāt anantaram yattaḥ bhagadattaḥ pratāpavān

original: 06,083.008c māgadhaiś ca kaliṅgaiś ca piśācaiś ca viśāṃ pate
analyzed: māgadhaiḥ ca kaliṅgaiḥ ca piśācaiḥ ca viśām pate
prāgjyotiṣāt anu nṛpaḥ kausalyaḥ bṛhat balaḥ

original: 06,083.009c mekalais traipuraiś caiva cicchilaiś ca samanvitaḥ
analyzed: mekalaiḥ traipuraiḥ ca eva cicchilaiḥ ca samanvitaḥ
bṛhadbalāt tatas śūraḥ trigartaḥ prasthala adhipaḥ

original: 06,083.010c kāmbojair bahubhiḥ sārdhaṃ yavanaiś ca sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: kāmbojaiḥ bahubhiḥ sārdham yavanaiḥ ca sahasraśas

original: 06,083.011a drauṇis tu rabhasaḥ śūras trigartād anu bhārata
analyzed: drauṇiḥ tu rabhasaḥ śūraḥ trigartāt anu bhārata
prayayau siṃhanādena nādayānaḥ dharā talam

original: 06,083.012a tathā sarveṇa sainyena rājā duryodhanas tadā
analyzed: tathā sarveṇa sainyena rājā duryodhanaḥ tadā
drauṇeḥ anantaram prāyāt sodaryaiḥ parivāritaḥ

original: 06,083.013a duryodhanād anu kṛpas tataḥ śāradvato yayau
analyzed: duryodhanāt anu kṛpaḥ tatas śāradvataḥ yayau
evam eṣa mahā vyūhaḥ prayayau sāgara upamaḥ

original: 06,083.014a rejus tatra patākāś ca śvetacchatrāṇi cābhibho
analyzed: rejuḥ tatra patākāḥ ca śveta chatrāṇi ca abhibho

original: 06,083.014c aṅgadāny atha citrāṇi mahārhāṇi dhanūṃṣi ca
analyzed: aṅgadāni atha citrāṇi mahārhāṇi dhanūṃṣi ca

original: 06,083.015a taṃ tu dṛṣṭvā mahāvyūhaṃ tāvakānāṃ mahārathaḥ
analyzed: tam tu dṛṣṭvā mahā vyūham tāvakānām mahā rathaḥ
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ bravīt tūrṇam pārṣatam pṛtanāpatim
paśya vyūham mahā iṣvāsa nirmitam sāgara upamam

original: 06,083.016c prativyūhaṃ tvam api hi kuru pārṣata māciram
analyzed: prativyūham tvam api hi kuru pārṣata māciram

original: 06,083.017a tataḥ sa pārṣataḥ śūro vyūhaṃ cakre sudāruṇam
analyzed: tatas sa pārṣataḥ śūraḥ vyūham cakre su dāruṇam
śṛṅgāṭakam mahā rāja para vyūha vināśanam

original: 06,083.018a śṛṅgebhyo bhīmasenaś ca sātyakiś ca mahārathaḥ
analyzed: śṛṅgebhyaḥ bhīmasenaḥ ca sātyakiḥ ca mahā rathaḥ
rathaiḥ aneka sāhasraiḥ tathā haya padātibhiḥ
nābhyām abhūt nara śreṣṭhaḥ śvetāśvaḥ vānaradhvajaḥ

original: 06,083.019c madhye yudhiṣṭhiro rājā mādrīputrau ca pāṇḍavau
analyzed: madhye yudhiṣṭhiraḥ rājā mādrī putrau ca pāṇḍavau
atha itare mahā iṣvāsāḥ saha sainyāḥ narādhipāḥ
vyūham tam pūrayām āsuḥ vyūha śāstra viśāradāḥ

original: 06,083.021a abhimanyus tataḥ paścād virāṭaś ca mahārathaḥ
analyzed: abhimanyuḥ tatas paścāt virāṭaḥ ca mahā rathaḥ

original: 06,083.021c draupadeyāś ca saṃhṛṣṭā rākṣasaś ca ghaṭotkacaḥ
analyzed: draupadeyāḥ ca saṃhṛṣṭāḥ rākṣasaḥ ca ghaṭotkacaḥ

original: 06,083.022a evam etaṃ mahāvyūhaṃ vyūhya bhārata pāṇḍavāḥ
analyzed: evam etam mahā vyūham vyūhya bhārata pāṇḍavāḥ
atiṣṭhan samare śūrāḥ yoddhu kāmāḥ jaya eṣiṇaḥ
bherī śabdāḥ ca tumulāḥ vimiśrāḥ śaṅkha nisvanaiḥ
kṣveḍita āsphoṭita utkruṣṭaiḥ su bhīmāḥ sarvatodiśam

original: 06,083.024a tataḥ śūrāḥ samāsādya samare te parasparam
analyzed: tatas śūrāḥ samāsādya samare te parasparam
netraiḥ animiṣaiḥ rājan avaikṣanta prakopitāḥ

original: 06,083.025a manobhis te manuṣyendra pūrvaṃ yodhāḥ parasparam
analyzed: manobhiḥ te manuṣya indra pūrvam yodhāḥ parasparam
yuddhāya samavartanta samāhūya itaretaram
tatas pravavṛte yuddham ghora rūpam bhaya āvaham
tāvakānām pareṣām ca nighnatām itaretaram

original: 06,083.027a nārācā niśitāḥ saṃkhye saṃpatanti sma bhārata
analyzed: nārācāḥ niśitāḥ saṃkhye saṃpatanti sma bhārata
vyātta ānanāḥ bhaya karāḥ uragāḥ iva saṃghaśas
niṣpetuḥ vimalāḥ śaktyaḥ taila dhautāḥ su tejanāḥ
ambudebhyaḥ yathā rājan bhrājamānāḥ śatahradāḥ

original: 06,083.029a gadāś ca vimalaiḥ paṭṭaiḥ pinaddhāḥ svarṇabhūṣitāḥ
analyzed: gadāḥ ca vimalaiḥ paṭṭaiḥ pinaddhāḥ svarṇa bhūṣitāḥ
patantyaḥ tatra dṛśyante giri śṛṅga upamāḥ śubhāḥ
nistriṃśāḥ ca vyarājanta vimala ambara saṃnibhāḥ
ārṣabhāṇi ca carmāṇi śata candrāṇi bhārata
aśobhanta raṇe rājan patamānāni sarvaśas
megha antare yathā vidyut jvalamānā iva dṛśyate
te nyonyam samare sene yudhyamāne narādhipa
aśobhetām yathā daitya deva sene samudyate
abhyadravanta samare te nyonyam vai samantataḥ

original: 06,083.032a rathās tu rathibhis tūrṇaṃ preṣitāḥ paramāhave
analyzed: rathāḥ tu rathibhiḥ tūrṇam preṣitāḥ parama āhave
yugaiḥ yugāni saṃśliṣya yuyudhuḥ pārthiva ṛṣabhāḥ
dantinām yudhyamānānām saṃgharṣāt pāvakaḥ bhavat
danteṣu bharata śreṣṭha sa dhūmaḥ sarvatodiśam

original: 06,083.034a prāsair abhihatāḥ ke cid gajayodhāḥ samantataḥ
analyzed: prāsaiḥ abhihatāḥ ke cid gaja yodhāḥ samantataḥ

original: 06,083.034c patamānāḥ sma dṛśyante giriśṛṅgān nagā iva
analyzed: patamānāḥ sma dṛśyante giri śṛṅgāt nagāḥ iva

original: 06,083.035a pādātāś cāpy adṛśyanta nighnanto hi parasparam
analyzed: pādātāḥ ca api adṛśyanta nighnantaḥ hi parasparam
citra rūpa dharāḥ śūrāḥ nakhara prāsa yodhinaḥ
anyonyam te samāsādya kuru pāṇḍava sainikāḥ

original: 06,083.036c śastrair nānāvidhair ghorai raṇe ninyur yamakṣayam
analyzed: śastraiḥ nānāvidhaiḥ ghoraiḥ raṇe ninyuḥ yama kṣayam
tatas śāṃtanavaḥ bhīṣmaḥ ratha ghoṣeṇa nādayan
abhyāgamat raṇe pāṇḍūn dhanuḥ śabdena mohayan
pāṇḍavānām rathāḥ ca api nadantaḥ bhairava svanam
abhyadravanta saṃyattāḥ dhṛṣṭadyumna purogamāḥ

original: 06,085.032c prababhau vasudhā ghorā tatra tatra viśāṃ pate
