original: 06,089.001a vimukhīkṛtya tān sarvāṃs tāvakān yudhi rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: vimukhīkṛtya tān sarvān tāvakān yudhi rākṣasaḥ
jighāṃsuḥ bharata śreṣṭha duryodhanam upādravat

original: 06,089.002a tam āpatantaṃ saṃprekṣya rājānaṃ prati vegitam
analyzed: tam āpatantam saṃprekṣya rājānam prati vegitam
abhyadhāvat jighāṃsantaḥ tāvakāḥ yuddha durmadāḥ
tāla mātrāṇi cāpāni vikarṣantaḥ mahā balāḥ
tam ekam abhyadhāvanta nadantaḥ siṃha saṃgha vat
atha enam śara varṣeṇa samantāt paryavārayan
parvatam vāri dhārābhiḥ śaradi iva balāhakāḥ

original: 06,089.005a sa gāḍhaviddho vyathitas tottrārdita iva dvipaḥ
analyzed: sa gāḍha viddhaḥ vyathitaḥ tottra arditaḥ iva dvipaḥ
utpapāta tadā ākāśam samantāt vainateya vat
vyanadat su mahā nādam jīmūtaḥ iva śāradaḥ

original: 06,089.006c diśaḥ khaṃ pradiśaś caiva nādayan bhairavasvanaḥ
analyzed: diśaḥ kham pradiśaḥ ca eva nādayan bhairava svanaḥ

original: 06,089.007a rākṣasasya tu taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
analyzed: rākṣasasya tu tam śabdam śrutvā rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
uvāca bharata śreṣṭhaḥ bhīmasenam idam vacaḥ
yudhyate rākṣasaḥ nūnam dhārtarāṣṭraiḥ mahā rathaiḥ

original: 06,089.008c yathāsya śrūyate śabdo nadato bhairavaṃ svanam
analyzed: yathā asya śrūyate śabdaḥ nadataḥ bhairavam svanam

original: 06,089.008e atibhāraṃ ca paśyāmi tatra tāta samāhitam
analyzed: atibhāram ca paśyāmi tatra tāta samāhitam

original: 06,089.009a pitāmahaś ca saṃkruddhaḥ pāñcālān hantum udyataḥ
analyzed: pitāmahaḥ ca saṃkruddhaḥ pāñcālān hantum udyataḥ

original: 06,089.009c teṣāṃ ca rakṣaṇārthāya yudhyate phalgunaḥ paraiḥ
analyzed: teṣām ca rakṣaṇa arthāya yudhyate phalgunaḥ paraiḥ
etat śrutvā mahā bāho kārya dvayam upasthitam

original: 06,089.010c gaccha rakṣasva haiḍimbaṃ saṃśayaṃ paramaṃ gatam
analyzed: gaccha rakṣasva haiḍimbam saṃśayam paramam gatam
bhrātuḥ vacanam ājñāya tvaramāṇaḥ vṛkodaraḥ
prayayau siṃhanādena trāsayan sarva pārthivān
vegena mahatā rājan parva kāle yathā udadhiḥ
tam anvayāt satyadhṛtiḥ saucittiḥ yuddha durmadaḥ

original: 06,089.012c śreṇimān vasudānaś ca putraḥ kāśyasya cābhibhūḥ
analyzed: śreṇimān vasudānaḥ ca putraḥ kāśyasya
abhimanyu mukhāḥ ca eva draupadeyāḥ mahā rathāḥ

original: 06,089.013c kṣatradevaś ca vikrāntaḥ kṣatradharmā tathaiva ca
analyzed: kṣatradevaḥ ca vikrāntaḥ kṣatradharmā tathā eva ca
anūpa adhipatiḥ ca eva nīlaḥ sva balam āsthitaḥ
mahatā ratha vaṃśena haiḍimbam paryavārayan

original: 06,089.015a kuñjaraiś ca sadā mattaiḥ ṣaṭsahasraiḥ prahāribhiḥ
analyzed: kuñjaraiḥ ca sadā mattaiḥ ṣaṣ sahasraiḥ prahāribhiḥ
abhyarakṣanta sahitāḥ rākṣasa indram ghaṭotkacam
siṃhanādena mahatā nemi ghoṣeṇa ca eva hi
khura śabda ninādaiḥ ca kampayantaḥ vasuṃdharām

original: 06,089.017a teṣām āpatatāṃ śrutvā śabdaṃ taṃ tāvakaṃ balam
analyzed: teṣām āpatatām śrutvā śabdam tam tāvakam balam
bhīmasena bhaya udvignam vivarṇa vadanam tathā
parivṛttam mahā rāja parityajya ghaṭotkacam

original: 06,089.018a tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ tatra tatra mahātmanām
analyzed: tatas pravavṛte yuddham tatra tatra mahātmanām
tāvakānām pareṣām ca saṃgrāmeṣu anivartinām
nānā rūpāṇi śastrāṇi visṛjantaḥ mahā rathāḥ
anyonyam abhidhāvantaḥ saṃprahāram pracakrire
vyatiṣaktam mahā raudram yuddham bhīru bhaya āvaham

original: 06,089.020a hayā gajaiḥ samājagmuḥ pādātā rathibhiḥ saha
analyzed: hayāḥ gajaiḥ samājagmuḥ pādātāḥ rathibhiḥ saha

original: 06,089.020b*0352_01 rathā rathaiḥ samāgacchan nāgā nāgaiś ca saṃyuge
analyzed: rathāḥ rathaiḥ samāgacchan nāgāḥ nāgaiḥ ca saṃyuge

original: 06,089.020c anyonyaṃ samare rājan prārthayānā mahad yaśaḥ
analyzed: anyonyam samare rājan prārthayānāḥ mahat yaśaḥ

original: 06,089.021a sahasā cābhavat tīvraṃ saṃnipātān mahad rajaḥ
analyzed: sahasā ca abhavat tīvram saṃnipātāt mahat rajaḥ
ratha aśva gaja pattīnām pada nemi samuddhatam
dhūmra aruṇam rajaḥ tīvram raṇa bhūmim samāvṛṇot

original: 06,089.022c naiva sve na pare rājan samajānan parasparam
analyzed: na eva sve na pare rājan samajānan parasparam

original: 06,089.023a pitā putraṃ na jānīte putro vā pitaraṃ tathā
analyzed: pitā putram na jānīte putraḥ vā pitaram tathā
nirmaryāde tathā bhūte vaiśase loma harṣaṇe
śastrāṇām bharata śreṣṭha manuṣyāṇām ca garjatām

original: 06,089.024c sumahān abhavac chabdo vaṃśānām iva dahyatām
analyzed: su mahān abhavat śabdaḥ vaṃśānām iva dahyatām
gaja vāji manuṣyāṇām śoṇita antra taraṅgiṇī
prāvartata nadī tatra keśa śaivala śādvalā

original: 06,089.026a narāṇāṃ caiva kāyebhyaḥ śirasāṃ patatāṃ raṇe
analyzed: narāṇām ca eva kāyebhyaḥ śirasām patatām raṇe

original: 06,089.026c śuśruve sumahāñ śabdaḥ patatām aśmanām iva
analyzed: śuśruve su mahān śabdaḥ patatām aśmanām iva

original: 06,089.027a viśiraskair manuṣyaiś ca chinnagātraiś ca vāraṇaiḥ
analyzed: viśiraskaiḥ manuṣyaiḥ ca chinna gātraiḥ ca vāraṇaiḥ
aśvaiḥ saṃbhinna dehaiḥ ca saṃkīrṇā abhūt vasuṃdharā
nānāvidhāni śastrāṇi visṛjantaḥ mahā rathāḥ
anyonyam abhidhāvantaḥ saṃprahāram pracakrire
hayāḥ hayān samāsādya preṣitāḥ haya sādibhiḥ
samāhatya raṇe nyonyam nipetuḥ gata jīvitāḥ
narāḥ narān samāsādya krodha rakta īkṣaṇāḥ bhṛśam
urāṃsi urobhiḥ anyonyam samāśliṣya nijaghnire
preṣitāḥ ca mahāmātraiḥ vāraṇāḥ para vāraṇāḥ
abhighnanti viṣāṇa agraiḥ vāraṇān eva saṃyuge
te jāta rudhira āpīḍāḥ patākābhiḥ alaṃkṛtāḥ
saṃsaktāḥ pratyadṛśyanta meghāḥ iva sa vidyutaḥ

original: 06,089.033a ke cid bhinnā viṣāṇāgrair bhinnakumbhāś ca tomaraiḥ
analyzed: ke cit bhinnāḥ viṣāṇa agraiḥ bhinna kumbhāḥ ca tomaraiḥ
vinadantaḥ bhyadhāvanta garjantaḥ jaladāḥ iva

original: 06,089.034a ke cid dhastair dvidhā chinnaiś chinnagātrās tathāpare
analyzed: ke cit hastaiḥ dvidhā chinnaiḥ chinna gātrāḥ tathā apare
nipetuḥ tumule tasmin chinna pakṣāḥ iva adrayaḥ

original: 06,089.035a pārśvais tu dāritair anye vāraṇair varavāraṇāḥ
analyzed: pārśvaiḥ tu dāritaiḥ anye vāraṇaiḥ vara vāraṇāḥ

original: 06,089.035c mumucuḥ śoṇitaṃ bhūri dhātūn iva mahīdharāḥ
analyzed: mumucuḥ śoṇitam bhūri dhātūn iva mahīdharāḥ

original: 06,089.036a nārācābhihatās tv anye tathā viddhāś ca tomaraiḥ
analyzed: nārāca abhihatāḥ tu anye tathā viddhāḥ ca tomaraiḥ
hata ārohāḥ vyadṛśyanta viśṛṅgāḥ iva parvatāḥ
ke cit krodha samāviṣṭāḥ mada andhāḥ niravagrahāḥ

original: 06,089.037c rathān hayān padātāṃś ca mamṛduḥ śataśo raṇe
analyzed: rathān hayān padātān ca mamṛduḥ śataśas raṇe
tathā hayāḥ haya ārohaiḥ tāḍitāḥ prāsa tomaraiḥ
tena tena abhyavartanta kurvantaḥ vyākulāḥ diśaḥ
rathinaḥ rathibhiḥ sārdham kula putrāḥ tanutyajaḥ

original: 06,089.039c parāṃ śaktiṃ samāsthāya cakruḥ karmāṇy abhītavat
analyzed: parām śaktim samāsthāya cakruḥ karmāṇi abhīta vat
svayaṃvare iva āmarde prajahruḥ itaretaram

original: 06,089.040c prārthayānā yaśo rājan svargaṃ vā yuddhaśālinaḥ
analyzed: prārthayānāḥ yaśaḥ rājan svargam vā yuddha śālinaḥ
tasmin tathā vartamāne saṃgrāme loma harṣaṇe
dhārtarāṣṭram mahat sainyam prāyaśas vimukhīkṛtam
saṃjayaḥ uvāca

original: 06,090.001a svasainyaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā rājā duryodhanaḥ svayam
analyzed: sva sainyam nihatam dṛṣṭvā rājā duryodhanaḥ svayam
abhyadhāvata saṃkruddhaḥ bhīmasenam ariṃdamam
pragṛhya su mahat cāpam indra aśani sama svanam
mahatā śara varṣeṇa pāṇḍavam samavākirat
ardhacandram ca saṃdhāya su tīkṣṇam lomavāhinam
bhīmasenasya ciccheda cāpam krodha samanvitaḥ
tat antaram ca saṃprekṣya tvaramāṇaḥ mahā rathaḥ

original: 06,090.004c saṃdadhe niśitaṃ bāṇaṃ girīṇām api dāraṇam
analyzed: saṃdadhe niśitam bāṇam girīṇām api dāraṇam
tena urasi mahā bāhuḥ bhīmasenam atāḍayat
sa gāḍha viddhaḥ vyathitaḥ parisaṃlihan
samālalambe tejasvī dhvajam hema pariṣkṛtam
tathā vimanasam dṛṣṭvā bhīmasenam ghaṭotkacaḥ
krodhena abhiprajajvāla didhakṣan iva pāvakaḥ
abhimanyu mukhāḥ ca eva pāṇḍavānām mahā rathāḥ
samabhyadhāvan krośantaḥ rājānam jāta saṃbhramāḥ
saṃprekṣya tān āpatataḥ saṃkruddhām jāta saṃbhramān
bhāradvājaḥ bravīt vākyam tāvakānām mahā rathān

original: 06,090.009a kṣipraṃ gacchata bhadraṃ vo rājānaṃ parirakṣata
analyzed: kṣipram gacchata bhadram vaḥ rājānam parirakṣata
saṃśayam paramam prāptam majjantam vyasana arṇave
ete kruddhāḥ mahā iṣvāsāḥ pāṇḍavānām mahā rathāḥ
bhīmasenam puraskṛtya duryodhanam upadrutāḥ
nānāvidhāni śastrāṇi visṛjantaḥ jaye ratāḥ

original: 06,090.011c nadanto bhairavān nādāṃs trāsayantaś ca bhūm imām
analyzed: nadantaḥ bhairavān nādān trāsayantaḥ ca bhūm imām
tat ācārya vacaḥ śrutvā somadatta purogamāḥ
tāvakāḥ samavartanta pāṇḍavānām anīkinīm
kṛpaḥ bhūriśravāḥ śalyaḥ droṇaputraḥ viviṃśatiḥ
citrasenaḥ vikarṇaḥ ca saindhavaḥ bṛhat balaḥ
āvantyau ca mahā iṣvāsau kauravam paryavārayan
te viṃśati padam gatvā saṃprahāram pracakrire
pāṇḍavāḥ dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ ca paraspara jighāṃsavaḥ

original: 06,090.015a evam uktvā mahābāhur mahad visphārya kārmukam
analyzed: evam uktvā mahā bāhuḥ mahat visphārya kārmukam
bhāradvājaḥ tatas bhīmam ṣaḍviṃśatyā samārpayat

original: 06,090.016a bhūyaś cainaṃ mahābāhuḥ śaraiḥ śīghram avākirat
analyzed: bhūyas ca enam mahā bāhuḥ śaraiḥ śīghram avākirat
parvatam vāri dhārābhiḥ śaradi iva balāhakaḥ
tam pratyavidhyat daśabhiḥ bhīmasenaḥ śilīmukhaiḥ
tvaramāṇaḥ mahā iṣvāsaḥ savye pārśve mahā balaḥ

original: 06,090.018a sa gāḍhaviddho vyathito vayovṛddhaś ca bhārata
analyzed: sa gāḍha viddhaḥ vyathitaḥ vayaḥ vṛddhaḥ ca bhārata
pranaṣṭa saṃjñaḥ sahasā rathopasthe upāviśat

original: 06,090.019a guruṃ pravyathitaṃ dṛṣṭvā rājā duryodhanaḥ svayam
analyzed: gurum pravyathitam dṛṣṭvā rājā duryodhanaḥ svayam
drauṇāyaniḥ ca saṃkruddhau bhīmasenam abhidrutau
tau āpatantau saṃprekṣya kāla antaka yama upamau
bhīmasenaḥ mahā bāhuḥ gadām ādāya sa tvaraḥ

original: 06,090.021a avaplutya rathāt tūrṇaṃ tasthau girir ivācalaḥ
analyzed: avaplutya rathāt tūrṇam tasthau giriḥ iva acalaḥ
samudyamya gadām gurvīm yama daṇḍa upamām raṇe

original: 06,090.022a tam udyatagadaṃ dṛṣṭvā kailāsam iva śṛṅgiṇam
analyzed: tam udyata gadam dṛṣṭvā kailāsam iva śṛṅgiṇam
kauravaḥ droṇaputraḥ ca sahitau abhyadhāvatām

original: 06,090.023a tāv āpatantau sahitau tvaritau balināṃ varau
analyzed: tau āpatantau sahitau tvaritau balinām varau
abhyadhāvata vegena tvaramāṇaḥ vṛkodaraḥ
tam āpatantam saṃprekṣya saṃkruddham bhīma darśanam
samabhyadhāvan tvaritāḥ kauravāṇām mahā rathāḥ
bhāradvāja mukhāḥ sarve bhīmasena jighāṃsayā
nānāvidhāni śastrāṇi bhīmasya urasi apātayan
sahitāḥ pāṇḍavam sarve pīḍayantaḥ samantataḥ

original: 06,090.026a taṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃśayaṃ prāptaṃ pīḍyamānaṃ mahāratham
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā saṃśayam prāptam pīḍyamānam mahā ratham
abhimanyu prabhṛtayaḥ pāṇḍavānām mahā rathāḥ
abhyadhāvan parīpsantaḥ prāṇān tyaktvā su dustyajān
anūpa adhipatiḥ śūraḥ bhīmasya dayitaḥ sakhā
nīlaḥ nīla ambuda prakhyaḥ saṃkruddhaḥ drauṇim abhyayāt

original: 06,090.027e spardhate hi maheṣvāso nityaṃ droṇasutena yaḥ
analyzed: spardhate hi mahā iṣvāsaḥ nityam droṇa sutena yaḥ

original: 06,090.028a sa visphārya mahac cāpaṃ drauṇiṃ vivyādha patriṇā
analyzed: sa visphārya mahat cāpam drauṇim vivyādha patriṇā

original: 06,090.028c yathā śakro mahārāja purā vivyādha dānavam
analyzed: yathā śakraḥ mahā rāja purā vivyādha dānavam
vipracittim durādharṣam devatānām bhayaṃkaram

original: 06,090.029c yena lokatrayaṃ krodhāt trāsitaṃ svena tejasā
analyzed: yena lokatrayam krodhāt trāsitam svena tejasā

original: 06,090.029d*0353_01 sa rudreṇa jitaḥ pūrvaṃ nihato mātariśvanā
analyzed: sa rudreṇa jitaḥ pūrvam nihataḥ mātariśvanā
tathā nīlena nirbhinnaḥ su mukhena patatriṇā
saṃjāta rudhira utpīḍaḥ drauṇiḥ krodha samanvitaḥ
sa visphārya dhanuḥ citram indra aśani sama svanam
dadhre nīla vināśāya matim matimatām varaḥ
tatas saṃdhāya vimalān bhallān karmāra pāyitān

original: 06,090.032c jaghāna caturo vāhān pātayām āsa ca dhvajam
analyzed: jaghāna caturaḥ vāhān pātayām āsa ca dhvajam

original: 06,090.032d*0354_01 tataḥ ṣaṣṭhena bhallena rathāt sūtam apātayat
analyzed: tatas ṣaṣṭhena bhallena rathāt sūtam apātayat
sūtam ca ekena bhallena rathanīḍāt apāharat

original: 06,090.033a saptamena ca bhallena nīlaṃ vivyādha vakṣasi
analyzed: saptamena ca bhallena nīlam vivyādha vakṣasi
sa gāḍha viddhaḥ vyathitaḥ rathopasthe upāviśat
mohitam vīkṣya rājānam nīlam abhra caya upamam
ghaṭotkacaḥ pi saṃkruddhaḥ bhrātṛbhiḥ parivāritaḥ
abhidudrāva vegena drauṇim āhava śobhinam
tathā itare abhyadhāvan rākṣasāḥ yuddha durmadāḥ
bhīmasenaḥ pi samare nīlam nīlāñjana prabham
āropya sva ratham vīraḥ duryodhanam upādravat
tam āpatantam saṃprekṣya rākṣasam ghora darśanam
abhyadhāvata tejasvī bhāradvāja ātmajaḥ tvaran
nijaghāna ca saṃkruddhaḥ rākṣasān bhīma darśanān
yaḥ bhavan agratas kruddhāḥ rākṣasasya puraḥsarāḥ

original: 06,090.038a vimukhāṃś caiva tān dṛṣṭvā drauṇicāpacyutaiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: vimukhān ca eva tān dṛṣṭvā drauṇi cāpa cyutaiḥ śaraiḥ
akrudhyata mahā kāyaḥ bhaimaseniḥ ghaṭotkacaḥ
prāduścakre mahā māyām ghora rūpām su dāruṇām
mohayan samare drauṇim māyāvī rākṣasa adhipaḥ

original: 06,090.040a tatas te tāvakāḥ sarve māyayā vimukhīkṛtāḥ
analyzed: tatas te tāvakāḥ sarve māyayā vimukhīkṛtāḥ
anyonyam samapaśyanta nikṛttān medinī tale
viceṣṭamānān kṛpaṇām śoṇitena samukṣitān

original: 06,090.041a droṇaṃ duryodhanaṃ śalyam aśvatthāmānam eva ca
analyzed: droṇam duryodhanam śalyam aśvatthāmānam eva ca

original: 06,090.041c prāyaśaś ca maheṣvāsā ye pradhānāś ca kauravāḥ
analyzed: prāyaśas ca mahā iṣvāsāḥ ye pradhānāḥ ca kauravāḥ

original: 06,090.042a vidhvastā rathinaḥ sarve gajāś ca vinipātitāḥ
analyzed: vidhvastāḥ rathinaḥ sarve gajāḥ ca vinipātitāḥ
hayāḥ ca sa haya ārohāḥ vinikṛttāḥ sahasraśas

original: 06,090.043a tad dṛṣṭvā tāvakaṃ sainyaṃ vidrutaṃ śibiraṃ prati
analyzed: tat dṛṣṭvā tāvakam sainyam vidrutam śibiram prati

original: 06,090.043c mama prākrośato rājaṃs tathā devavratasya ca
analyzed: mama prākrośataḥ rājan tathā devavratasya ca

original: 06,090.044a yudhyadhvaṃ mā palāyadhvaṃ māyaiṣā rākṣasī raṇe
analyzed: yudhyadhvam mā palāyadhvam māyā eṣā rākṣasī raṇe
ghaṭotkaca prayuktā iti na atiṣṭhanta vimohitāḥ

original: 06,090.044e naiva te śraddadhur bhītā vadator āvayor vacaḥ
analyzed: na eva te śraddadhuḥ bhītāḥ vadatoḥ āvayoḥ vacaḥ

original: 06,090.045a tāṃś ca pradravato dṛṣṭvā jayaṃ prāptāś ca pāṇḍavāḥ
analyzed: tān ca pradravataḥ dṛṣṭvā jayam prāptāḥ ca pāṇḍavāḥ
ghaṭotkacena sahitāḥ siṃhanādān pracakrire

original: 06,090.046a evaṃ tava balaṃ sarvaṃ haiḍimbena durātmanā

gāṅgeyasya ratha abhyāśam upajagme mahā bhaye

original: 06,110.021a kṛpaś ca kṛtavarmā ca saindhavaś ca jayadrathaḥ
analyzed: kṛpaḥ ca kṛtavarmā ca saindhavaḥ ca jayadrathaḥ
vinda anuvindau āvantyau ājagmuḥ saṃyugam tadā

original: 06,110.022a tato bhīmo maheṣvāsaḥ phalgunaś ca mahārathaḥ
analyzed: tatas bhīmaḥ mahā iṣvāsaḥ phalgunaḥ ca mahā rathaḥ

original: 06,110.022c kauravāṇāṃ camūṃ ghorāṃ bhṛśaṃ dudruvatū raṇe
analyzed: kauravāṇām camūm ghorām bhṛśam dudruvatuḥ raṇe
tatas barhiṇavājānām ayutāni arbudāni ca
dhanaṃjaya rathe tūrṇam pātayanti sma saṃyuge
tatas tām śara jālena saṃnivārya mahā rathān

original: 06,110.024c pārthaḥ samantāt samare preṣayām āsa mṛtyave
analyzed: pārthaḥ samantāt samare preṣayām āsa mṛtyave

original: 06,110.025a śalyas tu samare jiṣṇuṃ krīḍann iva mahārathaḥ
analyzed: śalyaḥ tu samare jiṣṇum krīḍan iva mahā rathaḥ
ājaghāna urasi kruddhaḥ bhallaiḥ saṃnata parvabhiḥ

original: 06,110.026a tasya pārtho dhanuś chittvā hastāvāpaṃ ca pañcabhiḥ
analyzed: tasya pārthaḥ dhanuḥ chittvā hasta āvāpam ca pañcabhiḥ

original: 06,110.026c athainaṃ sāyakais tīkṣṇair bhṛśaṃ vivyādha marmaṇi
analyzed: athā enam sāyakaiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ bhṛśam vivyādha marmaṇi
athā anyat dhanuḥ ādāya samare bhāra sādhanam

original: 06,110.027c madreśvaro raṇe jiṣṇuṃ tāḍayām āsa roṣitaḥ
analyzed: madra īśvaraḥ raṇe jiṣṇum tāḍayām āsa roṣitaḥ

original: 06,110.028a tribhiḥ śarair mahārāja vāsudevaṃ ca pañcabhiḥ
analyzed: tribhiḥ śaraiḥ mahā rāja vāsudevam ca pañcabhiḥ

original: 06,110.028c bhīmasenaṃ ca navabhir bāhvor urasi cārpayat
analyzed: bhīmasenam ca navabhiḥ bāhvoḥ urasi ca arpayat

original: 06,110.029a tato droṇo mahārāja māgadhaś ca mahārathaḥ
analyzed: tatas droṇaḥ mahā rāja māgadhaḥ ca mahā rathaḥ
duryodhana samādiṣṭau tam deśam upajagmatuḥ

original: 06,110.030a yatra pārtho mahārāja bhīmasenaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
analyzed: yatra pārthaḥ mahā rāja bhīmasenaḥ ca pāṇḍavaḥ
kauravyasya mahā senām jaghnatuḥ tau mahā rathau

original: 06,110.031a jayatsenas tu samare bhīmaṃ bhīmāyudhaṃ yuvā
analyzed: jayatsenaḥ tu samare bhīmam bhīma āyudham yuvā
vivyādha niśitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ aṣṭabhiḥ bharata ṛṣabha

original: 06,110.032a taṃ bhīmo daśabhir viddhvā punar vivyādha saptabhiḥ
analyzed: tam bhīmaḥ daśabhiḥ viddhvā punar vivyādha saptabhiḥ
sārathim ca asya bhallena rathanīḍāt apāharat
udbhrāntaiḥ turagaiḥ saḥ tha dravamāṇaiḥ samantataḥ
māgadhaḥ u pahṛtaḥ rājā sarva sainyasya paśyataḥ

original: 06,110.034a droṇas tu vivaraṃ labdhvā bhīmasenaṃ śilīmukhaiḥ
analyzed: droṇaḥ tu vivaram labdhvā bhīmasenam śilīmukhaiḥ

original: 06,110.034c vivyādha bāṇaiḥ suśitaiḥ pañcaṣaṣṭyā tam āyasaiḥ
analyzed: vivyādha bāṇaiḥ su śitaiḥ pañcaṣaṣṭyā tam āyasaiḥ

original: 06,110.035a taṃ bhīmaḥ samaraślāghī guruṃ pitṛsamaṃ raṇe
analyzed: tam bhīmaḥ samara ślāghī gurum pitṛ samam raṇe

original: 06,110.035c vivyādha navabhir bhallais tathā ṣaṣṭyā ca bhārata
analyzed: vivyādha navabhiḥ bhallaiḥ tathā ṣaṣṭyā ca bhārata

original: 06,110.036a arjunas tu suśarmāṇaṃ viddhvā bahubhir āyasaiḥ
analyzed: arjunaḥ tu suśarmāṇam viddhvā bahubhiḥ āyasaiḥ

original: 06,110.036c vyadhamat tasya tat sainyaṃ mahābhrāṇi yathānilaḥ
analyzed: vyadhamat tasya tat sainyam mahā abhrāṇi yathā anilaḥ

original: 06,110.037a tato bhīṣmaś ca rājā ca saubalaś ca bṛhadbalaḥ
analyzed: tatas bhīṣmaḥ ca rājā ca saubalaḥ ca bṛhadbalaḥ
abhyadravanta saṃkruddhāḥ bhīmasena dhanaṃjayau

original: 06,110.038a tathaiva pāṇḍavāḥ śūrā dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pārṣataḥ
analyzed: tathā eva pāṇḍavāḥ śūrāḥ dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ ca pārṣataḥ
abhyadravan raṇe bhīṣmam vyādita āsyam iva antakam
śikhaṇḍī tu samāsādya bhāratānām pitāmaham
abhyadravata saṃhṛṣṭaḥ bhayam tyaktvā yata vratam
yudhiṣṭhira mukhāḥ pārthāḥ puraskṛtya śikhaṇḍinam

original: 06,110.040c ayodhayan raṇe bhīṣmaṃ saṃhatāḥ saha sṛñjayaiḥ
analyzed: ayodhayan raṇe bhīṣmam saṃhatāḥ saha sṛñjayaiḥ
tathā eva tāvakāḥ sarve puraskṛtya yata vratam
śikhaṇḍi pramukhān pārthān yodhayanti sma saṃyuge
tatas pravavṛte yuddham kauravāṇām bhaya āvaham

original: 06,110.042c tatra pāṇḍusutaiḥ sārdhaṃ bhīṣmasya vijayaṃ prati
analyzed: tatra pāṇḍu sutaiḥ sārdham bhīṣmasya vijayam prati

original: 06,110.043a tāvakānāṃ raṇe bhīṣmo glaha āsīd viśāṃ pate
analyzed: tāvakānām raṇe bhīṣmaḥ glahe āsīt viśām pate

original: 06,110.043c tatra hi dyūtam āyātaṃ vijayāyetarāya vā
analyzed: tatra hi dyūtam āyātam vijayāya itarāya vā
dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ mahā rāja sarva sainyāni acodayat
abhidravata gāṅgeyam mā bhaiṣṭa nara sattamāḥ
senāpati vacaḥ śrutvā pāṇḍavānām varūthinī

original: 06,110.045c bhīṣmam evābhyayāt tūrṇaṃ prāṇāṃs tyaktvā mahāhave
analyzed: bhīṣmam eva abhyayāt tūrṇam prāṇān tyaktvā mahā āhave

original: 06,110.046a bhīṣmo 'pi rathināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ pratijagrāha tāṃ camūm
analyzed: bhīṣmaḥ pi rathinām śreṣṭhaḥ pratijagrāha tām camūm
āpatantīm mahā rāja velām iva mahā udadhiḥ
dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ uvāca
katham śāṃtanavaḥ bhīṣmaḥ daśame hani saṃjaya
ayudhyata mahā vīryaiḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha sṛñjayaiḥ

original: 06,111.002a kuravaś ca kathaṃ yuddhe pāṇḍavān pratyavārayan
analyzed: kuravaḥ ca katham yuddhe pāṇḍavān pratyavārayan
ācakṣva me mahā yuddham bhīṣmasya āhava śobhinaḥ
saṃjayaḥ uvāca
kuravaḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ sārdham yathā ayudhyanta bhārata

original: 06,111.003c yathā ca tad abhūd yuddhaṃ tat te vakṣyāmi śṛṇvataḥ
analyzed: yathā ca tat abhūt yuddham tat te vakṣyāmi śṛṇvataḥ
preṣitāḥ para lokāya parama astraiḥ kirīṭinā
ahani ahani saṃprāptāḥ tāvakānām ratha vrajāḥ
yathāpratijñam kauravyaḥ sa ca api samitiṃjayaḥ
pārthānām akarot bhīṣmaḥ satatam samiti kṣayam
kurubhiḥ sahitam bhīṣmam yudhyamānam mahā ratham

original: 06,111.006c arjunaṃ ca sapāñcālyaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃśayitā janāḥ
analyzed: arjunam ca sa pāñcālyam dṛṣṭvā saṃśayitāḥ janāḥ
daśame hani tasmin tu bhīṣma arjuna samāgame
avartata mahā raudraḥ satatam samiti kṣayaḥ

original: 06,111.008a tasminn ayutaśo rājan bhūyaś ca sa paraṃtapaḥ
analyzed: tasmin ayutaśas rājan bhūyas ca sa paraṃtapaḥ
bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavaḥ jaghāna parama astra vid
yeṣām a jñāta kalpāni nāma gotrāṇi pārthiva

original: 06,111.009c te hatās tatra bhīṣmeṇa śūrāḥ sarve 'nivartinaḥ
analyzed: te hatāḥ tatra bhīṣmeṇa śūrāḥ sarve nivartinaḥ
daśa ahāni tatas taptvā bhīṣmaḥ pāṇḍava vāhinīm
niravidyata dharma ātmā jīvitena paraṃtapaḥ

original: 06,111.011a sa kṣipraṃ vadham anvicchann ātmano 'bhimukhaṃ raṇe
analyzed: sa kṣipram vadham anvicchan ātmanaḥ bhimukham raṇe
na hanyām mānava śreṣṭhān saṃgrāme abhimukhān iti
cintayitvā mahā bāhuḥ pitā devavrataḥ tava
abhyāśa stham mahā rāja pāṇḍavam vākyam abravīt
yudhiṣṭhira mahā prājña sarva śāstra viśārada

original: 06,111.013c śṛṇu me vacanaṃ tāta dharmyaṃ svargyaṃ ca jalpataḥ
analyzed: śṛṇu me vacanam tāta dharmyam svargyam ca jalpataḥ
nirviṇṇaḥ smi bhṛśam tāta dehena anena bhārata

original: 06,111.014c ghnataś ca me gataḥ kālaḥ subahūn prāṇino raṇe
analyzed: ghnataḥ ca me gataḥ kālaḥ su bahūn prāṇinaḥ raṇe

original: 06,111.015a tasmāt pārthaṃ purodhāya pāñcālān sṛñjayāṃs tathā
analyzed: tasmāt pārtham purodhāya pāñcālān sṛñjayān tathā

original: 06,111.015c madvadhe kriyatāṃ yatno mama ced icchasi priyam
analyzed: mad vadhe kriyatām yatnaḥ mama ced icchasi priyam

original: 06,111.016a tasya tan matam ājñāya pāṇḍavaḥ satyadarśanaḥ
analyzed: tasya tat matam ājñāya pāṇḍavaḥ satya darśanaḥ

original: 06,111.016c bhīṣmaṃ pratiyayau yattaḥ saṃgrāme saha sṛñjayaiḥ
analyzed: bhīṣmam pratiyayau yattaḥ saṃgrāme saha sṛñjayaiḥ

original: 06,111.017a dhṛṣṭadyumnas tato rājan pāṇḍavaś ca yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
analyzed: dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ tatas rājan pāṇḍavaḥ ca yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: 06,111.017c śrutvā bhīṣmasya tāṃ vācaṃ codayām āsatur balam
analyzed: śrutvā bhīṣmasya tām vācam codayām āsatuḥ balam
abhidravata yudhyadhvam bhīṣmam jayata saṃyuge
rakṣitāḥ satya saṃdhena jiṣṇunā ripu jiṣṇunā
ayam ca api mahā iṣvāsaḥ pārṣataḥ vāhinīpatiḥ

original: 06,111.019c bhīmasenaś ca samare pālayiṣyati vo dhruvam
analyzed: bhīmasenaḥ ca samare pālayiṣyati vaḥ dhruvam

original: 06,111.020a na vai bhīṣmād bhayaṃ kiṃ cit kartavyaṃ yudhi sṛñjayāḥ
analyzed: na vai bhīṣmāt bhayam kim cit kartavyam yudhi sṛñjayāḥ
dhruvam bhīṣmam vijeṣyāmaḥ puraskṛtya śikhaṇḍinam
te tathā iti pratijñāya puraskṛtya śikhaṇḍinam

original: 06,111.021a tathā tu samayaṃ kṛtvā daśame 'hani pāṇḍavāḥ
analyzed: tathā tu samayam kṛtvā daśame hani pāṇḍavāḥ
brahma loka parāḥ bhūtvā saṃjagmuḥ krodha mūrchitāḥ
śikhaṇḍinam puraskṛtya pāṇḍavam ca dhanaṃjayam

original: 06,111.022c bhīṣmasya pātane yatnaṃ paramaṃ te samāsthitāḥ
analyzed: bhīṣmasya pātane yatnam paramam te samāsthitāḥ
tatas tava suta ādiṣṭāḥ nānā janapada īśvarāḥ
droṇena saha putreṇa saha senāḥ mahā balāḥ

original: 06,111.024a duḥśāsanaś ca balavān saha sarvaiḥ sahodaraiḥ
analyzed: duḥśāsanaḥ ca balavān saha sarvaiḥ sahodaraiḥ
bhīṣmam samara madhya stham pālayām cakrire tadā

original: 06,111.025a tatas tu tāvakāḥ śūrāḥ puraskṛtya yatavratam
analyzed: tatas tu tāvakāḥ śūrāḥ puraskṛtya yata vratam
śikhaṇḍi pramukhān pārthān yodhayanti sma saṃyuge
cedibhiḥ ca sa pāñcālaiḥ sahitaḥ vānaradhvajaḥ
yayau śāṃtanavam bhīṣmam puraskṛtya śikhaṇḍinam

original: 06,111.027a droṇaputraṃ śiner naptā dhṛṣṭaketus tu pauravam
analyzed: droṇaputram śineḥ naptā dhṛṣṭaketuḥ tu pauravam
yudhāmanyuḥ saha amātyam duryodhanam ayodhayat
virāṭaḥ tu saha anīkaḥ saha senam jayadratham
vṛddhakṣatrasya dāyādam āsasāda paraṃtapaḥ
citrasenaḥ tava sutam vicitra śara kārmukam
madra rājam mahā iṣvāsam saha sainyam yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
bhīmasena abhiguptaḥ ca nāga anīkam upādravat
apradhṛṣyam anāvāryam sarva śastrabhṛtām varam

original: 06,111.030c droṇaṃ prati yayau yattaḥ pāñcālyaḥ saha somakaiḥ
analyzed: droṇam prati yayau yattaḥ pāñcālyaḥ saha somakaiḥ
karṇikāra dhvajam ca api siṃhaketuḥ ariṃdamaḥ
pratyujjagāma saubhadram rāja putraḥ bṛhadbalaḥ

original: 06,111.032a śikhaṇḍinaṃ ca putrās te pāṇḍavaṃ ca dhanaṃjayam
analyzed: śikhaṇḍinam ca putrāḥ te pāṇḍavam ca dhanaṃjayam
rājabhiḥ samare sārdham abhipetuḥ jighāṃsavaḥ
tasmin ati mahā bhīme senayoḥ vai parākrame
saṃpradhāvatsu anīkeṣu medinī samakampata
tāni anīkāni anīkeṣu samasajjanta bhārata

original: 06,111.034c tāvakānāṃ pareṣāṃ ca dṛṣṭvā śāṃtanavaṃ raṇe
analyzed: tāvakānām pareṣām ca dṛṣṭvā śāṃtanavam raṇe
tatas teṣām prayatatām anyonyam abhidhāvatām

original: 06,111.035c prādurāsīn mahāñ śabdo dikṣu sarvāsu bhārata
analyzed: prādurāsīt mahān śabdaḥ dikṣu sarvāsu bhārata
śaṅkha dundubhi ghoṣaiḥ ca vāraṇānām ca bṛṃhitaiḥ
siṃhanādaiḥ ca sainyānām dāruṇaḥ samapadyata
sā ca sarva narendrāṇām candra arka sadṛśī prabhā
vīra aṅgada kirīṭeṣu niṣprabhā samapadyata
rajaḥ meghāḥ ca saṃjajñuḥ śastra vidyudbhiḥ āvṛtāḥ
dhanuṣām ca eva nirghoṣaḥ dāruṇaḥ samapadyata
bāṇa śaṅkha praṇādāḥ ca bherīṇām ca mahā svanāḥ

original: 06,111.039c rathagoṣaś ca saṃjagmuḥ senayor ubhayor api
analyzed: ca saṃjagmuḥ senayoḥ ubhayoḥ api
prāsa śakti ṛṣṭi saṃghaiḥ ca bāṇa oghaiḥ ca samākulam
niṣprakāśam iva ākāśam senayoḥ samapadyata

original: 06,111.041a anyonyaṃ rathinaḥ petur vājinaś ca mahāhave
analyzed: anyonyam rathinaḥ petuḥ vājinaḥ ca mahā āhave

original: 06,111.041c kuñjarāḥ kuñjarāñ jaghnuḥ padātīṃś ca padātayaḥ
analyzed: kuñjarāḥ kuñjarām jaghnuḥ padātīn ca padātayaḥ

original: 06,111.042a tad āsīt sumahad yuddhaṃ kurūṇāṃ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
analyzed: tat āsīt su mahat yuddham kurūṇām pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
bhīṣma hetoḥ nara vyāghra śyenayoḥ āmiṣe yathā

original: 06,111.043a tayoḥ samāgamo ghoro babhūva yudhi bhārata
analyzed: tayoḥ samāgamaḥ ghoraḥ babhūva yudhi bhārata
anyonyasya vadha arthāya jigīṣūṇām raṇa ajire
saṃjayaḥ uvāca
abhimanyuḥ mahā rāja tava putram ayodhayat
mahatyā senayā yuktaḥ bhīṣma hetoḥ parākramī
duryodhanaḥ raṇe kārṣṇim navabhiḥ nata parvabhiḥ

original: 06,112.002c ājaghāna raṇe kruddhaḥ punaś cainaṃ tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: ājaghāna raṇe kruddhaḥ punar ca enam tribhiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 06,112.003a tasya śaktiṃ raṇe kārṣṇir mṛtyor ghorām iva svasām
analyzed: tasya śaktim raṇe kārṣṇiḥ mṛtyoḥ ghorām iva svasām
preṣayām āsa saṃkruddhaḥ duryodhana ratham prati

original: 06,112.004a tām āpatantīṃ sahasā ghorarūpāṃ viśāṃ pate
analyzed: tām āpatantīm sahasā ghora rūpām viśām pate

original: 06,112.004c dvidhā ciccheda te putraḥ kṣurapreṇa mahārathaḥ
analyzed: dvidhā ciccheda te putraḥ kṣurapreṇa mahā rathaḥ

original: 06,112.005a tāṃ śaktiṃ patitāṃ dṛṣṭvā kārṣṇiḥ paramakopanaḥ
analyzed: tām śaktim patitām dṛṣṭvā kārṣṇiḥ parama kopanaḥ

original: 06,112.005c duryodhanaṃ tribhir bāṇair bāhvor urasi cārpayat
analyzed: duryodhanam tribhiḥ bāṇaiḥ bāhvoḥ urasi ca arpayat

original: 06,112.006a punaś cainaṃ śarair ghorair ājaghāna stanāntare
analyzed: punar ca enam śaraiḥ ghoraiḥ ājaghāna stanāntare
daśabhiḥ bharata śreṣṭha duryodhanam amarṣaṇam

original: 06,112.007a tad yuddham abhavad ghoraṃ citrarūpaṃ ca bhārata
analyzed: tat yuddham abhavat ghoram citra rūpam ca bhārata
īkṣitṛ prīti jananam sarva pārthiva pūjitam
bhīṣmasya nidhana arthāya pārthasya vijayāya ca
yuyudhāte raṇe vīrau saubhadra kuru puṃgavau
sātyakim rabhasam yuddhe drauṇiḥ brāhmaṇa puṃgavaḥ
ājaghāna urasi kruddhaḥ nārācena paraṃtapaḥ
śaineyaḥ pi guroḥ putram sarva marmasu bhārata
atāḍayat ameya ātmā navabhiḥ kaṅka patribhiḥ

original: 06,112.011a aśvatthāmā tu samare sātyakiṃ navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: aśvatthāmā tu samare sātyakim navabhiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 06,112.011c triṃśatā ca punas tūrṇaṃ bāhvor urasi cārpayat
analyzed: triṃśatā ca punar tūrṇam bāhvoḥ urasi ca arpayat
saḥ tividdhaḥ mahā iṣvāsaḥ droṇaputreṇa sātvataḥ
droṇaputram tribhiḥ bāṇaiḥ ājaghāna mahā yaśāḥ

original: 06,112.013a pauravo dhṛṣṭaketuṃ ca śarair āsādya saṃyuge
analyzed: pauravaḥ dhṛṣṭaketum ca śaraiḥ āsādya saṃyuge
bahudhā cakre mahā iṣvāsam mahā ratham
tathā eva pauravam yuddhe dhṛṣṭaketuḥ mahā rathaḥ
triṃśatā niśitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ vivyādha su mahā balaḥ

original: 06,112.015a pauravas tu dhanuś chittvā dhṛṣṭaketor mahārathaḥ
analyzed: pauravaḥ tu dhanuḥ chittvā dhṛṣṭaketoḥ mahā rathaḥ

original: 06,112.015c nanāda balavan nādaṃ vivyādha daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: nanāda balavat nādam vivyādha daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 06,112.016a so 'nyat kārmukam ādāya pauravaṃ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: saḥ kārmukam ādāya pauravam niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
ājaghāna mahā rāja trisaptatyā śilīmukhaiḥ

original: 06,112.017a tau tu tatra maheṣvāsau mahāmātrau mahārathau
analyzed: tau tu tatra mahā iṣvāsau mahāmātrau mahā rathau
mahatā śara varṣeṇa parasparam avarṣatām

original: 06,112.018a anyonyasya dhanuś chittvā hayān hatvā ca bhārata
analyzed: anyonyasya dhanuḥ chittvā hayān hatvā ca bhārata
virathau asi yuddhāya saṃgatau tau mahā rathau
ārṣabhe carmaṇī citre śata candra pariṣkṛte
tārakā śata citrau ca nistriṃśau su mahā prabhau

original: 06,112.020a pragṛhya vimalau rājaṃs tāv anyonyam abhidrutau
analyzed: pragṛhya vimalau rājan tau anyonyam abhidrutau
vāśitā saṃgame yattau siṃhau iva mahā vane
maṇḍalāni vicitrāṇi gata pratyāgatāni ca
ceratuḥ darśayantau ca prārthayantau parasparam
pauravaḥ dhṛṣṭaketum tu śaṅkha deśe mahā asinā

original: 06,112.022c tāḍayām āsa saṃkruddhas tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
analyzed: tāḍayām āsa saṃkruddhaḥ tiṣṭha tiṣṭha iti ca abravīt
cedi rājaḥ pi samare pauravam puruṣa ṛṣabham
ājaghāna śita agreṇa jatru deśe mahā asinā
tau anyonyam mahā rāja samāsādya mahā āhave
anyonya vega abhihatau nipetatuḥ ariṃdamau

original: 06,112.025a tataḥ svaratham āropya pauravaṃ tanayas tava
analyzed: tatas sva ratham āropya pauravam tanayaḥ tava
jayatsenaḥ rathe rājan apovāha raṇa ajirāt
dhṛṣṭaketum ca samare mādrī putraḥ paraṃtapaḥ
apovāha raṇe rājan sahadevaḥ pratāpavān
citrasenaḥ suśarmāṇam viddhvā navabhiḥ āśugaiḥ

original: 06,112.027c punar vivyādha taṃ ṣaṣṭyā punaś ca navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: punar vivyādha tam ṣaṣṭyā punar ca navabhiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 06,112.028a suśarmā tu raṇe kruddhas tava putraṃ viśāṃ pate
analyzed: suśarmā tu raṇe kruddhaḥ tava putram viśām pate

original: 06,112.028c daśabhir daśabhiś caiva vivyādha niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: daśabhiḥ daśabhiḥ ca eva vivyādha niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 06,112.029a citrasenaś ca taṃ rājaṃs triṃśatā nataparvaṇām
analyzed: citrasenaḥ ca tam rājan triṃśatā nata parvaṇām

original: 06,112.029c ājaghāna raṇe kruddhaḥ sa ca taṃ pratyavidhyata
analyzed: ājaghāna raṇe kruddhaḥ sa ca tam pratyavidhyata

original: 06,112.029e bhīṣmasya samare rājan yaśo mānaṃ ca vardhayan
analyzed: bhīṣmasya samare rājan yaśaḥ mānam ca vardhayan
saubhadraḥ rāja putram tu bṛhadbalam ayodhayat
pārtha hetoḥ parākrāntaḥ bhīṣmasya āyodhanam prati

original: 06,112.030c ārjuniṃ kosalendras tu viddhvā pañcabhir āyasaiḥ
analyzed: ārjunim kosala indraḥ tu viddhvā pañcabhiḥ āyasaiḥ
punar vivyādha viṃśatyā śaraiḥ saṃnata parvabhiḥ

original: 06,112.031a bṛhadbalaṃ ca saubhadro viddhvā navabhir āyasaiḥ
analyzed: bṛhadbalam ca saubhadraḥ viddhvā navabhiḥ āyasaiḥ

original: 06,112.031c nākampayata saṃgrāme vivyādha ca punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: na akampayata saṃgrāme vivyādha ca punar punar

original: 06,112.032a kausalyasya punaś cāpi dhanuś ciccheda phālguṇiḥ
analyzed: kausalyasya punar ca api dhanuḥ ciccheda phālguṇiḥ
ājaghāna śaraiḥ ca eva triṃśatā kaṅka patribhiḥ
saḥ kārmukam ādāya rāja putraḥ bṛhadbalaḥ

original: 06,112.033c phālguniṃ samare kruddho vivyādha bahubhiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: phālgunim samare kruddhaḥ vivyādha bahubhiḥ śaraiḥ
tayoḥ yuddham samabhavat bhīṣma hetoḥ paraṃtapa
saṃrabdhayoḥ mahā rāja samare citra yodhinoḥ
yathā devāsure yuddhe maya vāsavayoḥ abhūt
bhīmasenaḥ gaja anīkam yodhayan bahu aśobhata
yathā śakraḥ vajrapāṇiḥ dārayan parvata uttamān
te vadhyamānāḥ bhīmena mātaṅgāḥ giri saṃnibhāḥ
nipetuḥ urvyām sahitāḥ nādayantaḥ vasuṃdharām
giri mātrāḥ hi te nāgāḥ bhinnāñjana caya upamāḥ

original: 06,112.037c virejur vasudhāṃ prāpya vikīrṇā iva parvatāḥ
analyzed: virejuḥ vasudhām prāpya vikīrṇāḥ iva parvatāḥ
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ mahā iṣvāsaḥ madra rājānam āhave

original: 06,112.038c mahatyā senayā guptaṃ pīḍayām āsa saṃgataḥ
analyzed: mahatyā senayā guptam pīḍayām āsa saṃgataḥ
madra īśvaraḥ ca samare dharmaputram mahā ratham
pīḍayām āsa saṃrabdhaḥ bhīṣma hetoḥ parākramī
virāṭam saindhavaḥ rājā viddhvā saṃnata parvabhiḥ

original: 06,112.040c navabhiḥ sāyakais tīkṣṇais triṃśatā punar ardayat
analyzed: navabhiḥ sāyakaiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ triṃśatā punar ardayat
virāṭaḥ ca mahā rāja saindhavam vāhinī mukhe
triṃśatā niśitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ ājaghāna stanāntare
citra kārmuka nistriṃśau citra varma āyudha dhvajau
rejatuḥ citra rūpau tau saṃgrāme matsya saindhavau
droṇaḥ pāñcāla putreṇa samāgamya mahā raṇe
mahā samudayam cakre śaraiḥ saṃnata parvabhiḥ

original: 06,112.044a tato droṇo mahārāja pārṣatasya mahad dhanuḥ
analyzed: tatas droṇaḥ mahā rāja pārṣatasya mahat dhanuḥ
chittvā pañcāśatā iṣūṇām pārṣatam samavidhyata
saḥ niḥ at kārmukam ādāya pārṣataḥ para vīra hā

original: 06,112.045c droṇasya miṣato yuddhe preṣayām āsa sāyakān
analyzed: droṇasya miṣataḥ yuddhe preṣayām āsa sāyakān

original: 06,112.046a tāñ śarāñ śarasaṃghais tu saṃnivārya mahārathaḥ
analyzed: tām śarām śara saṃghaiḥ tu saṃnivārya mahā rathaḥ
droṇaḥ drupada putrāya prāhiṇot pañca sāyakān
tasya kruddhaḥ mahā rāja pārṣataḥ para vīra hā
droṇāya cikṣepa gadām yama daṇḍa upamām raṇe
tām āpatantīm sahasā hema paṭṭa vibhūṣitām

original: 06,112.048c śaraiḥ pañcāśatā droṇo vārayām āsa saṃyuge
analyzed: śaraiḥ pañcāśatā droṇaḥ vārayām āsa saṃyuge

original: 06,112.049a sā chinnā bahudhā rājan droṇacāpacyutaiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: sā chinnā bahudhā rājan droṇa cāpa cyutaiḥ śaraiḥ
cūrṇīkṛtā viśīryantī papāta vasudhā tale
gadām vinihatām dṛṣṭvā pārṣataḥ śatru sūdanaḥ
droṇāya śaktim cikṣepa sarva pāraśavīm śubhām

original: 06,112.051a tāṃ droṇo navabhir bāṇaiś ciccheda yudhi bhārata
analyzed: tām droṇaḥ navabhiḥ bāṇaiḥ ciccheda yudhi bhārata

original: 06,112.051c pārṣataṃ ca maheṣvāsaṃ pīḍayām āsa saṃyuge
analyzed: pārṣatam ca mahā iṣvāsam pīḍayām āsa saṃyuge

original: 06,112.052a evam etan mahad yuddhaṃ droṇapārṣatayor abhūt
analyzed: evam etat mahat yuddham droṇa pārṣatayoḥ abhūt
bhīṣmam prati mahā rāja ghora rūpam bhayānakam

original: 06,112.053a arjunaḥ prāpya gāṅgeyaṃ pīḍayan niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: arjunaḥ prāpya gāṅgeyam pīḍayan niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 06,112.053c abhyadravata saṃyattaṃ vane mattam iva dvipam
analyzed: abhyadravata saṃyattam vane mattam iva dvipam

original: 06,112.054a pratyudyayau ca taṃ pārthaṃ bhagadattaḥ pratāpavān
analyzed: pratyudyayau ca tam pārtham bhagadattaḥ pratāpavān
tridhā bhinnena nāgena mada andhena mahā balaḥ
tam āpatantam sahasā mahā indra gaja saṃnibham
param yatnam samāsthāya bībhatsuḥ pratyapadyata
tatas gaja gataḥ rājā bhagadattaḥ pratāpavān
arjunam śara varṣeṇa vārayām āsa saṃyuge

original: 06,112.057a arjunas tu raṇe nāgam āyāntaṃ rajatopamam
analyzed: arjunaḥ tu raṇe nāgam āyāntam rajata upamam
vimalaiḥ āyasaiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ avidhyata mahā raṇe

original: 06,112.058a śikhaṇḍinaṃ ca kaunteyo yāhi yāhīty acodayat
analyzed: śikhaṇḍinam ca kaunteyaḥ yāhi yāhi iti acodayat

original: 06,112.058c bhīṣmaṃ prati mahārāja jahy enam iti cābravīt
analyzed: bhīṣmam prati mahā rāja jahi enam iti ca abravīt
prāgjyotiṣaḥ tatas hitvā pāṇḍavam pāṇḍu pūrvaja

original: 06,112.059c prayayau tvarito rājan drupadasya rathaṃ prati
analyzed: prayayau tvaritaḥ rājan drupadasya ratham prati
tatas rjunaḥ mahā rāja bhīṣmam abhyadravat drutam
śikhaṇḍinam puraskṛtya tatas yuddham avartata

original: 06,112.061a tatas te tāvakāḥ śūrāḥ pāṇḍavaṃ rabhasaṃ raṇe
analyzed: tatas te tāvakāḥ śūrāḥ pāṇḍavam rabhasam raṇe
sarve bhyadhāvan krośantaḥ tat adbhutam iva abhavat
nānāvidhāni anīkāni putrāṇām te janādhipa
arjunaḥ vyadhamat kāle divi iva abhrāṇi mārutaḥ
śikhaṇḍī tu samāsādya bharatānām pitāmaham

original: 06,112.063c iṣubhis tūrṇam avyagro bahubhiḥ sa samācinot
analyzed: iṣubhiḥ tūrṇam avyagraḥ bahubhiḥ sa samācinot

original: 06,112.064a somakāṃś ca raṇe bhīṣmo jaghne pārthapadānugān
analyzed: somakān ca raṇe bhīṣmaḥ jaghne pārtha padānugān
nyavārayata sainyam ca pāṇḍavānām mahā rathaḥ
ratha agni agāraḥ cāpa arciḥ asi śakti gadā indhanaḥ
śara saṃgha mahā jvālaḥ kṣatriyān samare dahat

original: 06,112.066a yathā hi sumahān agniḥ kakṣe carati sānilaḥ
analyzed: yathā hi su mahān agniḥ kakṣe carati sa anilaḥ

original: 06,112.066c tathā jajvāla bhīṣmo 'pi divyāny astrāṇy udīrayan
analyzed: tathā jajvāla bhīṣmaḥ divyāni astrāṇi udīrayan
suvarṇa puṅkhaiḥ iṣubhiḥ śitaiḥ saṃnata parvabhiḥ

original: 06,112.067c nādayan sa diśo bhīṣmaḥ pradiśaś ca mahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: nādayan sa diśaḥ bhīṣmaḥ pradiśaḥ ca mahā yaśāḥ

original: 06,112.068a pātayan rathino rājan gajāṃś ca saha sādibhiḥ
analyzed: pātayan rathinaḥ rājan gajān ca saha sādibhiḥ
muṇḍa tāla vanāni iva cakāra sa ratha vrajān

original: 06,112.069a nirmanuṣyān rathān rājan gajān aśvāṃś ca saṃyuge
analyzed: nirmanuṣyān rathān rājan gajān aśvān ca saṃyuge

original: 06,112.069c cakāra sa tadā bhīṣmaḥ sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: cakāra sa tadā bhīṣmaḥ sarva śastrabhṛtām varaḥ
tasya jyā tala nirghoṣam visphūrjitam iva aśaneḥ
niśamya sarvatas rājan samakampanta sainikāḥ

original: 06,112.071a amoghā hy apatan bāṇāḥ pitus te manujeśvara
analyzed: amoghāḥ hi apatan bāṇāḥ pituḥ te manuja īśvara
na asajjanta śarīreṣu bhīṣma cāpa cyutāḥ śarāḥ

original: 06,112.072a nirmanuṣyān rathān rājan suyuktāñ javanair hayaiḥ
analyzed: nirmanuṣyān rathān rājan su yuktām javanaiḥ hayaiḥ
vātāyamānān paśyāma hriyamāṇān viśām pate
cedi kāśi karūṣāṇām sahasrāṇi caturdaśa
mahā rathāḥ samākhyātāḥ kula putrāḥ tanutyajaḥ
aparāvartinaḥ śūrāḥ suvarṇa vikṛta dhvajāḥ
saṃgrāme bhīṣmam āsādya sa vāji ratha kuñjarāḥ
jagmuḥ te para lokāya vyādita āsyam iva antakam
na tatra āsīt mahā rāja somakānām mahā rathaḥ

original: 06,112.075c yaḥ saṃprāpya raṇe bhīṣmaṃ jīvite sma mano dadhe
analyzed: yaḥ saṃprāpya raṇe bhīṣmam jīvite sma manaḥ dadhe

original: 06,112.076a tāṃś ca sarvān raṇe yodhān pretarājapuraṃ prati
analyzed: tān ca sarvān raṇe yodhān pretarāja puram prati

original: 06,112.076c nītān amanyanta janā dṛṣṭvā bhīṣmasya vikramam
analyzed: nītān amanyanta janāḥ dṛṣṭvā bhīṣmasya vikramam

original: 06,112.077a na kaś cid enaṃ samare pratyudyāti mahārathaḥ
analyzed: na kaḥ cit enam samare pratyudyāti mahā rathaḥ
ṛte pāṇḍu sutam vīram śvetāśvam kṛṣṇasārathim
śikhaṇḍinam ca samare pāñcālyam amita ojasam

original: 06,112.078a śikhaṇḍī tu raṇe bhīṣmam āsādya bharatarṣabha
analyzed: śikhaṇḍī tu raṇe bhīṣmam āsādya bharata ṛṣabha
daśabhiḥ daśabhiḥ bāṇaiḥ ājaghāna mahā āhave
śikhaṇḍinam tu gāṅgeyaḥ krodha dīptena cakṣuṣā
avaikṣata kaṭākṣeṇa nirdahan iva bhārata

original: 06,112.080a strītvaṃ tat saṃsmaran rājan sarvalokasya paśyataḥ
analyzed: strī tvam tat saṃsmaran rājan sarva lokasya paśyataḥ

original: 06,112.080c na jaghāna raṇe bhīṣmaḥ sa ca taṃ nāvabuddhavān
analyzed: na jaghāna raṇe bhīṣmaḥ sa ca tam na avabuddhavān
arjunaḥ tu mahā rāja śikhaṇḍinam abhāṣata
abhitvarasva tvaritaḥ jahi ca enam pitāmaham

original: 06,112.082a kiṃ te vivakṣayā vīra jahi bhīṣmaṃ mahāratham
analyzed: kim te vivakṣayā vīra jahi bhīṣmam mahā ratham

original: 06,112.082c na hy anyam anupaśyāmi kaṃ cid yaudhiṣṭhire bale
analyzed: na hi anyam anupaśyāmi kam cit yaudhiṣṭhire bale

original: 06,112.083a yaḥ śaktaḥ samare bhīṣmaṃ yodhayeta pitāmaham
analyzed: yaḥ śaktaḥ samare bhīṣmam yodhayeta pitāmaham

original: 06,112.083c ṛte tvāṃ puruṣavyāghra satyam etad bravīmi te
analyzed: ṛte tvām puruṣa vyāghra satyam etat bravīmi te

original: 06,112.084a evam uktas tu pārthena śikhaṇḍī bharatarṣabha
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu pārthena śikhaṇḍī bharata ṛṣabha
śaraiḥ nānāvidhaiḥ tūrṇam pitāmaham upādravat

original: 06,112.085a acintayitvā tān bāṇān pitā devavratas tava
analyzed: a cintayitvā tān bāṇān pitā devavrataḥ tava

original: 06,112.085c arjunaṃ samare kruddhaṃ vārayām āsa sāyakaiḥ
analyzed: arjunam samare kruddham vārayām āsa sāyakaiḥ

original: 06,112.086a tathaiva ca camūṃ sarvāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ mahārathaḥ
analyzed: tathā eva ca camūm sarvām pāṇḍavānām mahā rathaḥ
apraiṣīt samare tīkṣṇaiḥ para lokāya māriṣa

original: 06,112.087a tathaiva pāṇḍavā rājan sainyena mahatā vṛtāḥ
analyzed: tathā eva pāṇḍavāḥ rājan sainyena mahatā vṛtāḥ

original: 06,112.087c bhīṣmaṃ pracchādayām āsur meghā iva divākaram
analyzed: bhīṣmam pracchādayām āsuḥ meghāḥ iva divākaram
sa samantāt parivṛtaḥ bhārataḥ bharata ṛṣabha

original: 06,112.088c nirdadāha raṇe śūrān vanaṃ vahnir iva jvalan
analyzed: nirdadāha raṇe śūrān vanam vahniḥ iva jvalan
tatra adbhutam apaśyāma tava putrasya pauruṣam

original: 06,112.089c ayodhayata yat pārthaṃ jugopa ca yatavratam
analyzed: ayodhayata yat pārtham jugopa ca yata vratam

original: 06,112.090a karmaṇā tena samare tava putrasya dhanvinaḥ
analyzed: karmaṇā tena samare tava putrasya dhanvinaḥ
duḥśāsanasya tutuṣuḥ sarve lokāḥ mahātmanaḥ

original: 06,112.091a yad ekaḥ samare pārthān sānugān samayodhayat
analyzed: yat ekaḥ samare pārthān sa anugān samayodhayat

original: 06,112.091c na cainaṃ pāṇḍavā yuddhe vāyarām āsur ulbaṇam
analyzed: na ca enam pāṇḍavāḥ yuddhe āsuḥ ulbaṇam
duḥśāsanena samare rathinaḥ virathīkṛtāḥ

original: 06,112.092c sādinaś ca mahārāja dantinaś ca mahābalāḥ
analyzed: sādinaḥ ca mahā rāja dantinaḥ ca mahā balāḥ
vinirbhinnāḥ śaraiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ nipetuḥ dharaṇī tale
śara āturāḥ tathā eva anye dantinaḥ vidrutāḥ diśaḥ

original: 06,112.094a yathāgnir indhanaṃ prāpya jvaled dīptārcir ulbaṇaḥ
analyzed: yathā agniḥ indhanam prāpya jvalet dīpta arciḥ ulbaṇaḥ

original: 06,112.094c tathā jajvāla putras te pāṇḍavān vai vinirdahan
analyzed: tathā jajvāla putraḥ te pāṇḍavān vai vinirdahan
tam bhārata mahāmātram pāṇḍavānām mahā rathaḥ

original: 06,112.095c jetuṃ notsahate kaś cin nāpy udyātuṃ kathaṃ cana
analyzed: jetum nā utsahate kaḥ cit na api udyātum katham cana
ṛte mahā indra tanayam śvetāśvam kṛṣṇasārathim

original: 06,112.096a sa hi taṃ samare rājan vijitya vijayo 'rjunaḥ
analyzed: sa hi tam samare rājan vijitya vijayaḥ rjunaḥ
bhīṣmam eva abhidudrāva sarva sainyasya paśyataḥ
vijitaḥ tava bhīṣma bāhu vyapāśrayaḥ
punar punar samāśvasya prāyudhyata raṇa utkaṭaḥ

original: 06,112.097e arjunaṃ ca raṇe rājan yodhayan sa vyarājata
analyzed: arjunam ca raṇe rājan yodhayan sa vyarājata

original: 06,112.098a śikhaṇḍī tu raṇe rājan vivyādhaiva pitāmaham
analyzed: śikhaṇḍī tu raṇe rājan vivyādha eva pitāmaham
śaraiḥ aśani saṃsparśaiḥ tathā sarpa viṣa upamaiḥ

original: 06,112.099a na ca te 'sya rujaṃ cakruḥ pitus tava janeśvara
analyzed: na ca te sya rujam cakruḥ pituḥ tava janeśvara

original: 06,112.099b*0466_01 jaghāna bāṇān gāṅgeyas tathā muktāñ śikhaṇḍinaḥ
analyzed: jaghāna bāṇān gāṅgeyaḥ tathā muktām śikhaṇḍinaḥ

original: 06,112.099c smayamānaś ca gāṅgeyas tān bāṇāñ jagṛhe tadā
analyzed: smayamānaḥ ca gāṅgeyaḥ tān bāṇām jagṛhe tadā

original: 06,112.100a uṣṇārto hi naro yadvaj jaladhārāḥ pratīcchati
